quests.description_ja: ２隻以上の艦で構成される「艦隊」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A1: First Formation
quests.description: Have 2 ships in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 駆逐艦４隻以上で構成される「駆逐隊」を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have 4 DD in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 軽巡洋艦を旗艦とし、数隻の駆逐艦で構成される「水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have a CL as a flagship and 3-5 DD in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 全6隻で構成される主力艦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have 6 ships in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 軽巡洋艦２隻を擁する高速艦隊を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 軽巡２隻を擁する隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have 2 CL in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 空母1隻以上を旗艦とし、その護衛艦艇と共に、空母機動部隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Tenryuu (天龍) and Tatsuta (龍田) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 川内型軽巡洋艦「川内」「神通」「那珂」を同一艦隊に配属せよ！

quests.description: Have Sendai (川内), Jintsuu (神通) and Naka (那珂) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 妙高型重巡洋艦「妙高」「那智」「足柄」「羽黒」を同一艦隊に配属せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「妙高」型重巡姉妹の全４隻を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智), Ashigara (足柄) and Haguro (羽黒) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 扶桑型戦艦「扶桑」「山城」を同一艦隊に配属せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「扶桑」型戦艦姉妹の全２隻を編成せよ！
quests.title: A17: Form a Fusou-class Fleet
quests.description: Have Fusou (扶桑) and Yamashiro (山城) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 伊勢型戦艦「伊勢」「日向」を同一艦隊に配属せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「伊勢」型戦艦姉妹の全２隻を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Ise (伊勢) and Hyuuga (日向) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 戦艦1隻以上、重巡2隻以上を主力とした水上打撃艦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have a BB (slow or fast, BBV don't count) and 2 CA in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 一航戦「赤城」「加賀」二航戦「飛龍」「蒼龍」からなる第一機動部隊を編成せよ！

quests.description_ja: 二つ目の艦隊、第２艦隊の旗艦を指定して、第２艦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have a flagship in your second fleet.

quests.description_ja: 多数の水上偵察機を運用する「水上機母艦」を艦隊に配備せよ！

quests.description: Have a CV/CVL and 3 DD in your second fleet.

quests.description_ja: 金剛型戦艦「金剛」「比叡」「榛名」「霧島」全４隻の高速戦艦を集中配備せよ！

quests.description_ja: 「鳥海」「青葉」「加古」「古鷹」「天龍」を含む高速艦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description_ja: 「暁」「響」「雷」「電」4隻による第六駆逐隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have ONLY Akatsuki (暁), Hibiki (響), Inazuma (雷) and Ikazuchi (電) in your main fleet.

quests.description: Have Atago (愛宕), Takao (高雄), Choukai (鳥海) and Maya (摩耶) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「扶桑」「山城」「最上」「時雨」を基幹とした西村艦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上) and Shigure (時雨) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「翔鶴」「瑞鶴」を基幹とし、駆逐艦2隻を加えた第五航空戦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴) and 2 DD in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「鳥海」「青葉」「衣笠」「加古」「古鷹」「天龍」からなる三川艦隊を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新「三川艦隊」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A24: Form the New Mikawa Fleet
quests.description: Have Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹) and Tenryuu (天龍) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 伊号潜水艦2隻からなる潜水艦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have 2 SS/SSV in your main fleet.

quests.description: Have ONLY 2 BBV and 2 CAV in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 伊号潜水艦3隻以上からなる潜水艦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have 3 SS/SSV in your fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「古鷹」「加古」「青葉」「衣笠」を基幹とした第六戦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Aoba (青葉) and Kinugasa (衣笠) in your main fleet.

quests.title: A29: Form the 5th Fleet
quests.description: Have Nachi (那智), Ashigara (足柄), Tama (多摩) and Kiso (木曾) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「阿武隈」「曙」「潮」「霞」「不知火」を中核とした「第一水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Abukuma (阿武隈), Akebono (曙), Ushio (潮), Kasumi (霞) and Shiranui (不知火) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「朝潮」「満潮」「大潮」「荒潮」4隻による第八駆逐隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A31: Form the 8th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have ONLY Asashio (朝潮), Michishio (満潮), Ooshio (大潮) and Arashio (荒潮) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「霞」「霰」「陽炎」「不知火」4隻による第十八駆逐隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A32: Form the 18th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have ONLY Kasumi (霞), Arare (霰), Kagerou (陽炎) and Shiranui (不知火) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「睦月」「如月」「弥生」「望月」4隻による第三十駆逐隊(第一次)を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have ONLY Mutsuki (睦月), Kisaragi (如月), Yayoi (弥生) and Mochizuki (望月) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 第一艦隊旗艦に練度の高い(Lv.90以上～99以下)艦娘を配備して気持ちを整理せよ！

quests.description: Organize your feelings and deploy your fleet with a high level flagship (Lv.90~99)!

quests.description_ja: 第一艦隊旗艦に強い絆を結んだLv.100以上の艦娘を配備した6隻の艦隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: WA02: Journey Anew
quests.description: Organize a fleet of 6 ships with your newly bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as the flagship!

quests.description_ja: 「睦月」「弥生」「卯月」「望月」4隻による第三十駆逐隊(第二次)を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第三十駆逐隊(第二次)」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A34: Form the 30th Destroyer Division (Gen.2)
quests.description: Have ONLY Mutsuki (睦月), Yayoi (弥生), Uzuki (卯月) and Mochizuki (望月) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「妙高」「那智」「羽黒」を基幹とした第五戦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智) and Haguro (羽黒) in your main fleet.

quests.title_ja: 新編「第二航空戦隊」を編成せよ！

quests.description_ja: 「潜水母艦」と複数の潜水艦(4隻以上)からなる潜水艦隊「第六艦隊」を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have an AS as the flagship and 4 (or more) SS/SSV in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「蒼龍改二」(※旗艦)及び「飛龍改二」を基幹とした二航戦(要駆逐艦2隻)を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Souryuu Kai2 (蒼龍改二) as the flagship, Hiryuu Kai2 (飛龍改二) and 2 DD in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 第二次改装を完了した改装金剛型高速戦艦4隻を集結させよ！

quests.description_ja: 雲龍型航空母艦一番艦「雲龍」を第一艦隊機旗艦に配備せよ！

quests.description: Have Unryuu (雲龍) as your flagship.

quests.description_ja: 長門型2隻及び扶桑型2隻の計4隻の主力戦艦からなる第二戦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description_ja: 大和型・長門型・伊勢型・扶桑型のいずれか3隻と軽巡1隻他の水上打撃部隊を配備せよ！

quests.description: Have Akashi (明石) as your flagship in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「扶桑」「山城」「最上」「時雨」「満潮」を基幹とした西村艦隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and Michishio (満潮) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 駆逐艦「霞」を旗艦とした重巡「足柄」及び軽巡1隻駆逐艦4隻の水上挺身部隊を編成せよ！

quests.description: Have Kasumi (霞) as the flagship, Ashigara (足柄), 1 CL and 3 more DD in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 特I型駆逐艦「吹雪」「白雪」「初雪」「叢雲」4隻による第十一駆逐隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A47: Form the 11th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have ONLY Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪) and Murakumo (叢雲) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「初春」「子日」「若葉」「初霜」4隻による第二一駆逐隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A48: Form the 21st Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have ONLY Hatsuharu (初春), Nenohi (子日), Wakaba (若葉) and Hatsushimo (初霜) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「皐月」「文月」「長月」他1隻計駆逐艦4隻による第二二駆逐隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A49: Form the 22nd Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have ONLY Satsuki (皐月), Fumizuki (文月), Nagatsuki (長月) and 1 more DD in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 第一艦隊において、「鳥海改ニ」を旗艦とする「三川艦隊」を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「三川艦隊」を新編、突入準備せよ！

quests.description: Have Choukai Kai2 (鳥海改ニ) as the flagship and any 5 of Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍), Yuubari (夕張) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 軽巡洋艦「天龍」「龍田」を基幹戦力とした「第十八戦隊」を4隻以上で新編成せよ！
quests.title: A51: Form the 18th Cruiser Division

quests.description_ja: 戦艦「比叡」「霧島」軽巡「長良」駆逐艦「暁」「雷」「電」による海上突入部隊を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 海上突入部隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A52: Form the Maritime Assault Fleet
quests.description: Have Hiei (比叡), Kirishima (霧島), Nagara (長良), Akatsuki (暁), Ikazuchi (雷) and Inazuma (電) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「暁改二」を旗艦とした「響」「雷」「電」4隻による第六駆逐隊を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第六駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A53: Form the New 6th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have ONLY Akatsuki Kai2 (暁改二) as the flagship, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Ikazuchi (雷) and Inazuma (電) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「阿武隈」を旗艦として「響」「初霜」「若葉」「五月雨」「島風」による一水戦を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方突入準備！
quests.title: A54: Prepare the 1st Torpedo Squadron for the Deployment to the Northern Sea
quests.description: Have Abukuma (阿武隈) as the flagship, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Hatsushimo (初霜), Wakaba (若葉), Samidare (五月雨) and Shimakaze (島風) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「阿武隈改二」を旗艦として「響」「夕雲」「長波」「秋雲」「島風」の一水戦を再編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方再突入準備！
quests.title: A55: Prepare the 1st Torpedo Squadron for Another Sortie to the Northern Sea
quests.description: Have Abukuma Kai2 (阿武隈改二) as the flagship, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Yuugumo (夕雲), Naganami (長波), Akigumo (秋雲) and Shimakaze (島風) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「翔鶴」「瑞鶴」と随伴駆逐艦「朧」「秋雲」を基幹とした第五航空戦隊を再編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第五航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！
quests.title: A56: ReOrganize the 5th Carrier Division
quests.description: Have Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴), Oboro (朧) and Akigumo (秋雲) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「那智改二」「足柄改二」及び「多摩」「木曾」を基幹とした、第二一戦隊を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第二一戦隊」出撃準備！
quests.title: A57: Prepare the New 21st Cruiser Division for Sortie
quests.description: Have Nachi Kai2 (那智改二), Ashigara Kai2 (足柄改二), Tama (多摩) and Kiso (木曾) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「足柄」を旗艦として「球磨」「長良」を擁する、第十六戦隊(第一次)を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A58: Organize the 16th Squadron (1st Gen.)
quests.description: Have Ashigara (足柄) as the flagship, Kuma (球磨) and Nagara (長良) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「瑞鶴改」を旗艦とし、「瑞鳳」「千歳」「千代田」を加えた4隻の空母部隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A59: Organize the 3rd Carrier Division
quests.description: Have Zuikaku Kai (瑞鶴改) as the flagship, Zuihou (瑞鳳), Chitose (千歳) and Chiyoda (千代田) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 航空戦艦「伊勢改」及び「日向改」を基幹戦力とした第四航空戦隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A60: Organize the 4th Carrier Division
quests.description: Have Ise Kai (伊勢改) and Hyuuga Kai (日向改) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「瑞鶴改」旗艦、空母「瑞鳳改」「千歳」「千代田」及び「伊勢改」「日向改」を配備せよ！
quests.title: A61: Organize the Ozawa Fleet
quests.description: Have Zuikaku Kai (瑞鶴改) as the flagship, aircraft carriers Zuihou Kai (瑞鳳改), Chitose (千歳) and Chiyoda (千代田), and aviation battleships Ise Kai (伊勢改) and Hyuuga Kai (伊勢改) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 改二改装を終えた翔鶴型航空母艦2隻と同護衛艦による新航空戦隊を新編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新航空戦隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A62: Organize the New Carrier Fleet
quests.description: Have Shoukaku Kai2 (翔鶴改二) and Zuikaku Kai2 (瑞鶴改) along with 2 destroyers as their escort in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「名取」を旗艦として「五十鈴」「鬼怒」を擁する、第十六戦隊(第二次)を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A63: Organize the 16th Squadron (2nd Gen.)
quests.description: Have Natori (名取) as the flagship, Isuzu (五十鈴) and Kinu (鬼怒) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 空母2隻+航空戦艦/航空巡洋艦2隻+駆逐艦2隻の新航空戦隊を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「新編成航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A64: Organize the New Carrier Division
quests.description: Have 2 fleet carriers, 2 aviation battleships or aviation cruisers and 2 destroyers in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 駆逐艦「霞」旗艦、「足柄」「大淀」「朝霜」「清霜」他の水上反撃部隊を再編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 精強な「水上反撃部隊」を再編成せよ！
quests.title: A65: Strengthen the Surface Counterattack Fleet
quests.description: Have Kasumi (霞) as the flagship, Ashigara (足柄), Ooyodo (大淀), Asashimo (朝霜) and Kiyoshimo (清霜) in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「五十鈴改二」旗艦、「皐月改二」「卯月改」を含む、対潜機動水上部隊を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第三十一戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A66: Organize the 31st Squadron (1st Gen.)
quests.description: Have Isuzu Kai2 (五十鈴改二) as the flagship, Satsuki Kai2 (皐月改二) and Uzuki Kai (卯月改) in your fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「白露改」旗艦、「時雨」「春雨」「五月雨」4隻による第二七駆逐隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A67: Organize the 27th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have Shiratsuyu Kai (白露改) as the flagship, Shigure (時雨), Harusame (春雨) and Samidare (五月雨) in your fleet. Only these 4 should be present.

quests.description_ja: 「川内改二」旗艦、「江風改二」「時雨改二」他駆逐2隻による水雷戦隊を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 強行高速輸送部隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A68: Organize the High-Speed Transport Fleet
quests.description: Have Sendai Kai2 (川内改二) as the flagship, Kawakaze Kai2 (江風改二), Shigure Kai2 (時雨改二) and two more destroyers in your fleet.

quests.description_ja: 軽巡級を旗艦とした駆逐艦4隻からなる強力な水雷戦隊を含む艦隊を再編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「水雷戦隊」を含む艦隊を再編成せよ！
quests.title: A69: Organize a New Torpedo Squadron
quests.description: Have a light cruiser as the flagship and 4 destroyers in your fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「朝潮改二」を旗艦とした「満潮」「大潮」「荒潮」4隻による第八駆逐隊を再編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第八駆逐隊」を再編成せよ！
quests.title: A70: Organize the New 8th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have only Asashio Kai2 (朝潮改二) as the flagship, Michishio (満潮), Ooshio (大潮) and Arashio (荒潮) in your fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「朝潮改二丁」及び「大潮改二」を含む艦隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A71: Elite Forces of the 8th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have Asashio Kai2 D (朝潮改二丁), Ooshio Kai2 (大潮改二) and 2 more ships in your fleet.

quests.description_ja: 特型駆逐艦「磯波」「浦波」「綾波」「敷波」4隻による第十九駆逐隊を編成せよ！
quests.title: A72: Organize the 19th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Have Isonami (磯波), Uranami (浦波), Ayanami (綾波), and Shikinami (敷波) in your fleet.

quests.description_ja: 「鬼怒」「青葉」「北上」「大井」を擁する、第十六戦隊(第三次)を編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A73: Organize the 3rd Generation of the 16th Squadron
quests.description: Have Kinu (鬼怒), Aoba (青葉), Kitakami (北上), and Ooi (大井) in your fleet.

quests.description_ja:
「鬼怒改二」を旗艦として、「北上改二」「大井改二」「球磨改」及び
「青葉改」「浦波改」「敷波改」から5隻、計6隻の精鋭「第十六戦隊」を再編成せよ！
quests.title_ja: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」を再編成せよ！
quests.title: A74: Organize the Elite 16th Squadron
quests.description: Have Kinu Kai2 (鬼怒改二) as the flagship and any 5 out of 6 following ships in your main fleet: Kitakami Kai2 (北上改二), Ooi Kai2 (大井改二), Kuma Kai (球磨改), Aoba Kai (青葉改), Uranami Kai (浦波改), Shikinami Kai (敷波改).

quests.description_ja:
編成任務：第一艦隊に新改装された長門型戦艦一番艦「長門改二」及び同二番艦「陸奥改」からなる
新編第一戦隊を配備せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第一戦隊」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A75: Organize the New First Squadron!
quests.description: Have Nagato Kai Ni (長門改二) as the flagship and Mutsu Kai in your main fleet.

quests.description_ja:
編成任務：第一艦隊旗艦に新改装された改鈴谷型「熊野改二」、同二番艦に「鈴谷改二」、
僚艦に「最上改」「三隈改」を配した新編第七戦隊を配備せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第七戦隊」を編成せよ！
quests.title: A76: Organize the new Seventh Squadron!
quests.description: Have Kumano Kai Ni (熊野改二) as the flagship, Suzuya Kai Ni (鈴谷改二) as the second ship, and both Mogami Kai (最上改) and Mikuma Kai (三隈改) in your main fleet.

quests.title: A77: Reorganize the Elite Fourth Carrier Division!
quests.description: Have Ise (伊勢) as the flagship, Hyuuga (日向) as the second ship, 1 Light Cruiser, 2 Destroyers and 1 additional ship in your main fleet. Both Ise and Hyuuga must be over level 50 (Kai forms are also acceptable).

quests.title: A78: Organize the New 4th Torpedo Squadron!
quests.description: Have Yura Kai2 (由良改二) as the flagship and Murasame (村雨), Yuudachi(夕立), Harusame(春雨), Samidare(五月雨) and one additional Destroyer in your main fleet.

quests.title: A79: Reorganize the Elite 22th Destroyer Squadron!
quests.description: Have Fumizuki Kai2 (文月改二), Satsuki Kai2 (皐月改二), Minazuki Kai (水無月改) and Nagatsuki (長月改) in your main fleet.

quests.title: A80: Form the powerful task force!
quests.description: Have Saratoga Mk.II or Mod.2 as flagship, 1 CL and 2 DDs in your main fleet. Two selectable rewards; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: A81: Organize the Most Elite 8th Destroyer Division!
quests.description: Have only Asashio Kai2, Arashio Kai2, Ooshio Kai2 and Michishio Kai2 in your main fleet.

quests.title: A82: Nishimura Fleet Second Squadron Accompanying Unit, Assemble!
quests.description: Have Mogami, Shigure, Michishio, Asagumo, and Yamagumo in your THIRD fleet. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bd1: Defeat an Enemy Fleet
quests.description: Sortie to any map and score a victory.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊と交戦せよ！
quests.title: B1: First Sortie
quests.description: Sortie your main fleet on a combat mission.

quests.description_ja: 鎮守府正面海域に艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦の跳梁を阻止せよ！
quests.title_ja: 鎮守府正面海域を護れ！
quests.title: B2: Protect the Sea Near the Naval Base
quests.description: Sortie to World 1-1 and clear the stage.

quests.description_ja: 南西諸島沖に艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊と交戦せよ！
quests.title_ja: 南西諸島沖に出撃せよ！
quests.title: B4: Sortie to the Sea Around Nansei Islands
quests.description: Sortie to World 1-2 and clear the stage.

quests.description_ja: 南西諸島沖に接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を迎撃せよ！
quests.title: B5: Intercept Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet
quests.description: Sortie to World 1-2 AGAIN and clear the stage.

quests.description_ja: 軽巡洋艦1隻を旗艦とし、複数の駆逐艦からなる水雷戦隊で出撃せよ！
quests.title: B6: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a CL as the flagship and 3 DD as escorts.

quests.description_ja: 重巡洋艦を旗艦とした艦隊を編成、これを出撃させよ！
quests.title: B7: Sortie a Heavy Cruiser
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a CA as the flagship.

quests.description_ja: 海上の覇者、戦艦を旗艦とした艦隊を編成、これを出撃させよ！
quests.title: B8: Sortie a Battleship
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a BB (slow or fast, BBV don't count) as the flagship.

quests.description_ja: 空母1隻とその護衛艦艇で構成した空母機動部隊を出撃させよ！
quests.title: B9: Sortie a Carrier Task Force
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with CV/CVL as the flagship and 5 DD/CL/AV.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊全力出撃！遊弋する敵艦隊を10回邀撃せよ！
quests.title: Bd3: Defeat 10 Enemy Fleets
quests.description: Score 10 victories against any enemy fleets.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊の脅威となる敵空母群。これを捕捉撃滅し、3隻轟沈せよ！
quests.title: Bd4: Sink 3 Enemy Carriers
quests.description: Sink 3 enemy aircraft carriers (CV/CVL).

quests.description_ja: 敵の輸送船5隻以上を撃沈し、敵の補給路を寸断せよ！
quests.title: Bd6: Strike the Enemy Transports
quests.description: Sink 5 enemy transport ships.

quests.description_ja: 1週間で敵輸送船を20隻以上撃沈せよ！
quests.title: Bw3: Disrupt the Marine Trade
quests.description: Sink 20 enemy transport ships.

quests.description_ja: 1週間の全力出撃を行い、可能な限り多くの敵艦隊を捕捉、これを迎撃せよ！
quests.title: Bw1: Operation A-Go
quests.description: Sortie your fleet 36 times, encounter 24 bosses, defeat 12 bosses and get 6 Perfect S rank victories.

quests.description_ja: 新たに編成した「第２艦隊」を出撃させよ！
quests.title: B3: Second Fleet's Deployment
quests.description: Sortie your 2nd Fleet on a combat mission.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊「主力」を捕捉！これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bd2: Sink an Enemy Flagship
quests.description: Sink a flagship of any enemy fleet.

quests.description_ja: 敵機動部隊を捕捉し、これを邀撃、敵空母を轟沈せよ！
quests.title: B10: Sink an Enemy Carrier
quests.description: Sink an enemy aircraft carrier (CV/CVL).

quests.description_ja: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵補給艦を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 敵補給艦を3隻撃沈せよ！
quests.title: Bd5: Sink 3 Transport Ships
quests.description: Sink 3 enemy transport ships.

quests.description_ja: 新編成した「三川艦隊」で出撃せよ！
quests.title: B11: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍) and another fast ship.

quests.description_ja: 有力な母艦航空隊で1週間の全力出撃を行い、可能な限り多くの敵空母を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bw2: Operation I-Go
quests.description: Sink 20 enemy aircraft carriers (CV/CVL).

quests.description_ja: 1週間の全力出撃を行い、敵輸送船団を捕捉・撃滅、敵の補給路を寸断せよ！
quests.title: Bw4: Operation Ro-Go
quests.description: Sink 50 enemy transport ships.

quests.description_ja: 「暁」「響」「雷」「電」による第六駆逐隊、出撃せよ！
quests.title: B12: Sortie the 6th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with ONLY Akatsuki (暁), Hibiki (響), Inazuma (電), and Ikazuchi (雷).

quests.description_ja: 「愛宕」「高雄」「鳥海」「摩耶」を基幹とする第四戦隊で、バシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B13: Sortie the 4th Cruiser Division
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Atago (愛宕), Takao (高雄), Choukai (鳥海), Maya (摩耶) and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-2 Boss.

quests.description_ja: 「扶桑」「山城」「最上」「時雨」を基幹とする西村艦隊で、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B14: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Fusou (扶桑改二), Yamashiro (山城改二), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

quests.description_ja: 「翔鶴」「瑞鶴」を基幹とする第五航空戦隊で、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B15: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴) and any 4 ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊を南西諸島海域に全力出撃させ、多数の敵艦隊「主力」群を捕捉、撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 南西諸島海域の制海権を握れ！
quests.title: Bd7: Gain Control of the Nansei Islands
quests.description: Defeat 5 bosses in World 2.

quests.description_ja: 完全編成した「三川艦隊」をもって、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B16: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹) and Tenryuu (天龍). Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

quests.description_ja: 有力な対潜能力を持つ海上護衛隊によって、可能な限り多くの敵潜水艦を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bw5: Maritime Escort Operation
quests.description: Sink 15 enemy submarines.

quests.description_ja: 西方海域に出撃し、敵東方艦隊の主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 敵東方艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bw6: Eliminate the Enemy's Eastern Fleet
quests.description: Defeat 12 bosses in World 4.

quests.description_ja: 対潜能力の充実した艦隊で出撃、敵潜水艦狩りを実施せよ！
quests.title: Bd8: Suppress the Enemy Submarines
quests.description: Sink 6 enemy submarines.

quests.description_ja: 伊号潜水艦2隻からなる潜水艦隊でオリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B17: Sortie a Submarine Fleet
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with 2 SS and 4 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

quests.description_ja: 航空戦艦2隻と航空巡洋艦2隻を基幹とする艦隊でカレー洋の制海権を握れ！
quests.title_ja: 「航空水上打撃艦隊」出撃せよ！
quests.title: B18: Sortie a Naval Aviation Strike Fleet
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with 2 BBV, 2 CAV and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 4-2 Boss.

quests.description_ja: 編成した「第六戦隊」をもって出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃滅「完全勝利」せよ！
quests.title: B19: Sortie the 6th Cruiser Division
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Kinugasa (衣笠), Aoba (青葉) and 2 additional ships. Score a S rank victory against World 2-3 Boss.

quests.description_ja: カンパン湾より突入部隊を出撃させ、水上反撃作戦【礼号作戦】を完遂せよ！
quests.title_ja: 水上反撃作戦【礼号作戦】を完遂せよ！
quests.title: Operation Rei-Go
quests.description: Clear E-2.

quests.description_ja: 編成した「第八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B20: Sortie the 8th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Asashio (朝潮), Michishio (満潮), Ooshio (大潮), Arashio (荒潮) and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

quests.description_ja: 編成した「第十八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B21: Sortie the 18th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Kasumi (霞), Arare (霰), Kagerou (陽炎), Shiranui (不知火) and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

quests.description_ja: 北方海域の深部に出撃し、敵北方艦隊の主力艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 敵北方艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bw7: Eliminate the Main Forces of the Enemy's Northern Fleet
quests.description: Defeat 5 bosses in Worlds 3-3, 3-4 or 3-5.

quests.description_ja: 西方海域カスガダマ島沖に出撃し、敵東方中枢艦隊を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
quests.title_ja: 敵東方中枢艦隊を撃破せよ！
quests.title: Bw8: Crush the Core of the Eastern Fleet
quests.description: Defeat World 4-4 boss.

quests.description_ja: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖に出撃し、敵機動部隊本体を捕捉撃滅、これに完全勝利せよ！
quests.title_ja: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖の制空権を握れ！
quests.title: Bw9: Seize Air Superiority in the South
quests.description: Score two S rank victories at the boss node of World 5-2.

quests.description_ja: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」を含む艦隊で出撃し、キス島沖の主力艦隊と交戦せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
quests.title: B22: Sortie the 30th Destroyer Division (Gen.1)
quests.description: Sortie a fleet that consists of Mutsuki (睦月), Kisaragi (如月), Yayoi (弥生), Mochizuki (望月) and up to 2 additional DD to World 3-2 and encounter the boss. C rank or above is required.

quests.description_ja: 練度の高い(Lv.90～99)第一艦隊旗艦で出撃し、オリョール海の暁に勝利を刻め！
quests.title: WB01: In Preparation of Love (Final)
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a high level (Lv.90~99) flagship to 2-3 obtain an S rank victory against the boss.

quests.description_ja: 強い絆を結んだ艦娘を旗艦とした第一艦隊でリランカ島へ出撃、敵中枢を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 二人でする初めての任務！
quests.title: WB02: Your First Mission Together
quests.description: Sortie a fleet to 4-3 with a bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as the flagship and score an S rank victory against the boss.

quests.description_ja: 航空戦艦2隻を基幹とする艦隊で、西方海域カスガダマ島の敵勢力を撃破せよ！
quests.title: B23: Sortie an Aviation Battleship Fleet
quests.description: Have 2 BBV ships in your main fleet and score a victory against World 4-4 Boss.

quests.description_ja: 「第三十駆逐隊(第二次)」は直ちに抜錨！鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を実施せよ！
quests.title: B24: 30th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
quests.description: Sortie Mutsuki (睦月), Yayoi (弥生), Uzuki (卯月) and Mochizuki (望月) to World 1-5 and reach the boss, scoring at least a C rank.

quests.description_ja: 「第五戦隊」は沖ノ島沖の戦闘哨戒を実施、敵艦隊主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bm1: Sortie the 5th Fleet
quests.description: Sortie Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智) and Haguro (羽黒) to World 2-5. You may add 3 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

quests.description_ja: 新編「二航戦」を基幹とした艦隊で、珊瑚諸島沖に出撃、敵機動部隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第二航空戦隊」出撃せよ！
quests.title: B25: Sortie the 2nd Carrier Division
quests.description: Sortie Hiryuu Kai2 (飛龍改二) as the flagship, Souryuu (蒼龍) and 2 DD to World 5-2. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

quests.description_ja: 錬成を終え再編成「二航戦」を基幹とした艦隊で、敵リランカ島を空襲、破砕せよ！
quests.title_ja: 精鋭「第二航空戦隊」抜錨せよ！
quests.title: B26: Sortie the Elite 2nd Carrier Division
quests.description: Sortie Souryuu Kai2 (蒼龍改二) as the flagship, Hiryuu Kai2 (飛龍改二) and 2 DD to World 4-3. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

quests.description_ja: 第二次改装実施した「榛名」を基幹とした艦隊で「南方海域」へ進出、敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B27: Deploy a Fleet Led By Haruna
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Haruna Kai2 (榛名改二) as the flagship and up to 5 additional ships to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

quests.description_ja: 雲龍型航空母艦「雲龍改」含む機動部隊で珊瑚島沖に出撃、敵機動部隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B28: Sortie the 601 Air Group
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Unryuu Kai (雲龍改) as the flagship to World 5-2 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

quests.description_ja: 軽空母1～2隻、軽巡1隻、駆逐艦3～4隻の艦隊でカムラン半島の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B29: Sortie a Light Carrier Squadron
quests.description: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 CVL, 1 CL and 3-4 DD to World 2-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

quests.description_ja: 軽巡を旗艦とした水雷戦隊(軽巡最大2隻他駆逐艦)でバシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「水雷戦隊」バシー島沖緊急展開
quests.title: B30: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron to Bashi Islands
quests.description: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 CL (one as the flagship) and 4-5 DD to World 2-2. Score a victory at the boss and sink the enemy flagship.

quests.description_ja: 潜水艦戦力を中核とした艦隊で中部海域哨戒線へ反復出撃、敵戦力を漸減せよ！
quests.title: Bm2: Sortie a Submarine Fleet
quests.description: Sortie to World 6-1 and obtain an S rank victory at the boss node 3 times.

quests.description_ja: 軽巡旗艦の水雷戦隊(軽巡最大3隻他駆逐艦)を急派、南西諸島防衛線で敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bm3: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron
quests.description: Sortie a fleet of 1-3 CL (one as the flagship) and 3-5 DD to World 1-4. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

quests.description_ja: 「第二戦隊」を基幹とした艦隊でカレー洋に進出、反復出撃により敵海上兵力を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B31: Sortie the 2nd Squadron
quests.description: Sortie Nagato (長門), Mutsu (陸奥), Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城) and up to 2 additional ships to World 4-2. Score two S rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 戦艦3隻軽巡1隻他を基幹とした水上打撃部隊で南方海域へ進出、敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bm4: Surface Strike Fleet, Onwards to the South!
quests.description: Sortie 3 BB/BBV (only slow battleships), 1 CL and up to 2 additional ships to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 戦艦2隻と直援軽空母1隻(正規空母無し)基幹の艦隊で北方AL海域に突入、敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「戦艦部隊」北方海域に突入せよ！
quests.title: B32: Sortie a Battleship Squadron to the Northern Sea
quests.description: Sortie 2 BB (slow or fast, BBV don't count), 1 CVL and up to 3 additional ships to World 3-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を反復実施し、安全な海上輸送路を確保せよ！
quests.title_ja: 海上輸送路の安全確保に努めよ！
quests.title: Bw10: Secure the Marine Transportation Route
quests.description: Sortie to World 1-5 and score an A rank victory (or higher) at the boss node 3 times.

quests.description_ja: 「西村艦隊」を南方海域に進出させ、敵主力艦隊へ突入、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「西村艦隊」南方海域へ進出せよ！
quests.title: B33: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet to the Southern Waters
quests.description: Sortie Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and Michishio (満潮) (you may also add another ship) to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「古鷹」「加古」「青葉」「衣笠」を基幹とした「第六戦隊」で、沖ノ島沖の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第六戦隊」南西海域へ出撃せよ！
quests.title: B34: Sortie the 6th Squadron to the Southwestern Waters
quests.description: Sortie Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠) and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 航空母艦2隻(随伴駆逐艦2隻)を基幹とする空母機動艦隊で、カレー洋の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bm6: Carrier Task Force, Onwards to the West!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet consisting of 2 CV/CVL, 2 DD and 2 additional ships to World 4-2. Score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 鎮守府正面海域の対潜哨戒を強化し、敵潜水艦を制圧、安全な海上輸送体制を確立せよ！
quests.title: Bm5: Monthly Escort Duty
quests.description: Sortie a fleet to World 1-5 and score 10 A rank (or above) victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 駆逐艦を旗艦とした重巡1隻軽巡1隻駆逐艦4隻からなる水上挺身部隊、沖ノ島沖に突入せよ！
quests.title: Bm7: Sortie the Counterattack Squadron
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a DD flagship, 1 CA, 1 CL and 3 more DD to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「第十一駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃破せよ！
quests.title: B35: Sortie the 11th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki (白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪), Murakumo (叢雲) and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and score a victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「第十一駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面へ展開、対潜哨戒を実施せよ！
quests.title: B36: 11th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
quests.description: Sortie Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪) and Murakumo (叢雲) to World 1-5 and get a score of at least C at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「第二一駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B37: Sortie the 21st Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie Hatsuharu (初春), Nenohi (子日), Wakaba (若葉) and Hatsushimo (初霜) and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「第二二駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で南西諸島防衛線に出撃、敵主力艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B39: Sortie the 22nd Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie Satsuki (皐月), Fumizuki (文月), Nagatsuki (長月), 1 more DD and up to 2 additional ships to World 1-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 旗艦「那智」及び「初霜」「霞」「潮」「曙」他1隻の艦隊でバシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B38: Sortie Nachi's Squadron
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Nachi (那智) as the flagship, Hatsushimo (初霜), Kasumi (霞), Ushio (潮), Akebono (曙) and 1 additional ship to World 2-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 摩耶改または摩耶改二及び軽巡1駆逐2隻を含む艦隊でオリョール海の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B40: Sortie the Remodelled Anti-Aircraft Heavy Cruiser
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Maya (摩耶) Kai or Kai2, 1 CL, 2 DD and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 第一艦隊に編成した「三川艦隊」を南方海域に進出させ、同方面の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「三川艦隊」ソロモン方面へ！
quests.title: B41: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet to Solomon Islands
quests.description: Sortie the main fleet with Choukai Kai2 (鳥海改ニ) as the flagship and any 5 of Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍), Yuubari (夕張) to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「第六駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面へ展開、対潜哨戒を実施せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒なのです！
quests.title: B42: 6th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
quests.description: Sortie Akatsuki (暁), Hibiki (響 or Верный), Inazuma (雷) and Ikazuchi (電) to World 1-5. At least C rank is required at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「天龍」「龍田」を基幹戦力とした「第十八戦隊」で出撃し、オリョール海の敵主力を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B43: 18th Cruiser Division, Set Sail!
quests.description: Sortie Tenryuu (天龍), Tatsuta (龍田) and 2 or more other ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「比叡」「霧島」「長良」「暁」「雷」「電」の艦隊で、南方海域進出作戦を実施、敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 海上突入部隊、進発せよ！
quests.title: B44: Sortie the Maritime Assault Fleet
quests.description: Sortie Hiei (比叡), Kirishima (霧島), Nagara (長良), Akatsuki (暁), Ikazuchi (雷) and Inazuma (電) to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「第六駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面で対潜哨戒を実施、敵潜水艦部隊を痛打せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒を徹底なのです！
quests.title: B45: 6th Destroyer Division's Thorough Anti-Submarine Patrol na no desu
quests.description: Sortie Akatsuki Kai2 (暁改二) as the flagship, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Ikazuchi (雷) and Inazuma (電) to World 1-5 and score an A rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 北方突入準備を完了した「一水戦」で北方キス島に突入！包囲網を破り、友軍を救出せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第一水雷戦隊」ケ号作戦、突入せよ！
quests.title: B46: Sortie the 1st Torpedo Squadron on Operation Ke
quests.description: Sortie Abukuma (阿武隈) as the flagship, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Hatsushimo (初霜), Wakaba (若葉), Samidare (五月雨) and Shimakaze (島風) to World 3-2 and score a victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 北方再突入準備の新編「一水戦」で北方キス島に再突入を敢行、同撤収作戦を完遂せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方ケ号作戦、再突入！
quests.title: B47: Sortie the 1st Torpedo Squadron on Operation Ke Again
quests.description: Sortie Abukuma Kai2 (阿武隈改二) as the flagship, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Yuugumo (夕雲), Naganami (長波), Akigumo (秋雲) and Shimakaze (島風) to World 3-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 航空母艦を旗艦とした空母機動部隊を北方AL海域方面に展開、敵戦力を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「空母機動部隊」北方海域に進出せよ！
quests.title: B49: Sortie an Aircraft Carrier Task Force to the Aleutian Islands
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a CV flagship to World 3-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化し、海上資源輸送路の安全を確立せよ！
quests.title_ja: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化せよ！
quests.title: B48: Strengthen the Anti-Submarine Patrol in Front of the Naval Base
quests.description: Sortie to World 1-5 and score 4 victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 再編成した「第五航空戦隊」を珊瑚諸島沖に展開、敵機動部隊を捕捉撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第五航空戦隊」珊瑚諸島沖に出撃せよ！
quests.title: B50: Sortie the 5th CarDiv to the South
quests.description: Sortie Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴), Oboro (朧), Akigumo (秋雲) and up to 2 additional ships to World 5-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 新編「第二一戦隊」を基幹とする艦隊で北方海域モーレイ海に出撃、敵を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第二一戦隊」北方へ出撃せよ！
quests.title: B51: Sortie the New 21st Cruiser Division
quests.description: Sortie Nachi Kai2 (那智改二), Ashigara Kai2 (足柄改二), Tama (多摩), Kiso (木曾) and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」をバシー島沖に展開、敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
quests.title: B52: Sortie the 16th Squadron (1st Gen.)
quests.description: Sortie Ashigara (足柄) as the flagship, Kuma (球磨), Nagara (長良) and up to 3 additional ships to World 2-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 近海及び北方海域の漁場に展開する敵艦隊を撃破して、「秋刀魚」を3尾入手せよ！
quests.title_ja: 秋刀魚漁：「秋刀魚」を収獲しよう！
quests.title: Saury Fishing: Let's Harvest Some Saury
quests.description: Defeat enemy fleets in Worlds 1 and 3 and gather 3 saury.

quests.description_ja: ちょっと大変だけれど、漁場の安全を確保して「秋刀魚」を10尾確保しなきゃ駄目よ！
quests.title_ja: 秋刀魚漁：「秋刀魚」をもっと収獲しなきゃ！
quests.title: Saury Fishing: You've Got to Harvest More Saury
quests.description: Ensure the safety of the fishing grounds and gather 10 more saury.

quests.description_ja: かなり大変だけれど、秋刀魚漁、もっともっと頑張ってもいいのよ！
quests.title_ja: 秋刀魚漁：もっと頑張ってもいいのよ！
quests.title: Saury Fishing: Let's Harvest Even More Saury
quests.description: Work hard and gather even more saury.

quests.description_ja: 編成した「第三航空戦隊」を南西諸島防衛線に展開、敵侵攻艦隊を捕捉撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第三航空戦隊」南西諸島防衛線に出撃！
quests.title: B53: Sortie the 3rd Carrier Division to Protect the Nansei Islands
quests.description: Sortie Zuikaku Kai (瑞鶴改) as the flagship, Zuihou (瑞鳳), Chitose (千歳), Chiyoda (千代田) and up to 2 additional ships to World 1-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「小沢艦隊」を沖ノ島海域前面に展開し、侵攻する敵機動部隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B54: Sortie the Ozawa Fleet
quests.description: Sortie Zuikaku Kai (瑞鶴改) as the flagship, aircraft carriers Zuihou Kai (瑞鳳改), Chitose (千歳) and Chiyoda (千代田), and aviation battleships Ise Kai (伊勢改) and Hyuuga Kai (伊勢改) to World 2-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」をオリョール海に展開、敵主力艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」出撃せよ！
quests.title: B55: Sortie the 16th Squadron (2nd Gen.)
quests.description: Sortie Natori (名取) as the flagship, Isuzu (五十鈴), Kinu (鬼怒) and up to 3 additional ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「新編成航空戦隊」をアルフォンシーノ方面へ進出、敵泊地の機動部隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編成航空戦隊、北方へ進出せよ！
quests.title: B56: Sortie the New Carrier Division to the North
quests.description: Sortie 2 fleet carriers, 2 aviation battleships or aviation cruisers and 2 destroyers to World 3-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 精強な「水上反撃部隊」で、南西諸島沖ノ島沖に突入！同海域の敵戦力を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B57: Operation Rei-go
quests.description: Sortie Kasumi (霞) as the flagship, Ashigara (足柄), Ooyodo (大淀), Asashimo (朝霜) and Kiyoshimo (清霜) (you may add another ship) to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 提督お手伝いすみません…「お飾り材料」を16個集めて頂けないでしょうか？
quests.title_ja: 師走の「間宮」のお手伝い
quests.title: Help Mamiya with Preparations
quests.description: Find 16 decoration materials for Mamiya.

quests.description_ja: 提督…もしよかったら…「お飾り材料」32個使って、お飾りを一緒に作りませんか？
quests.title_ja: 年越し準備！師走の「間宮」のお手伝い
quests.title: The New Year's Eve is Nigh! Help Mamiya With Preparations
quests.description: Gather 32 decoration materials.

quests.description_ja: 他の提督(プレイヤー)の艦隊と「演習」を行おう！
quests.title: C1: Your First Exercise
quests.description: Challenge another fleet in exercises.

quests.description_ja: 今週中に「演習」で他の提督の艦隊に対して20回「勝利」しよう！
quests.title: C4w: Large-scale Exercises
quests.description: Get 20 victories in exercises within the same week.

quests.description_ja: 本日中に他の司令官の艦隊に対して3回「演習」を挑もう！
quests.title: C2d1: Do Exercises
quests.description: Challenge 3 other fleets in exercises within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 本日中に他の司令官の艦隊との「演習」で5回以上「勝利」をおさめよう！
quests.title: C3d2: Defeat Other Admirals
quests.description: Get 5 victories in exercises within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 本日中に「演習」で2回以上「勝利」をおさめ、式への気持ちを整理しよう！
quests.title: WC01: In Preparation of Love (Part 2)
quests.description: Show your love by getting 2 victories in exercises.

quests.description_ja: 作戦前に艦隊の練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で3回以上「勝利」をおさめよう！
quests.title_ja: 艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
quests.title: C5: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet
quests.description: Get 3 victories in exercises within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊のさらなる練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で4回以上「勝利」をおさめよう！
quests.title_ja: 演習を強化、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
quests.title: C6: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet Again
quests.description: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊再突入に備え、艦隊練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で4回以上「勝利」せよ！
quests.title_ja: 北方再突入に備え、練度向上に努めよ！
quests.title: C7: Prepare for the Second Iteration of Operation Ke
quests.description: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 同日中に「演習」で7回以上「勝利」をおさめ、我が精鋭艦隊の練度を示そう！
quests.title: C8m: Exercises for the Elite
quests.description: Get 7 victories in exercises within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 島嶼攻略部隊の練度向上のため、本日中に演習で4回以上「勝利」せよ！
quests.title: C9: Exercises for the Landing Force
quests.description: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 秋の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊のさらなる練度に努めよ！
quests.title: C10: Large-Scale Exercises in Autumn
quests.description: Score 8 victories in exercises in a single day.

quests.description_ja: 冬の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊のさらなる練度に努めよ！
quests.title: C11: Large Scale Winter Training
quests.description: Score 8 victories in practice mode in a single day.

quests.description_ja: 春の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
quests.title: C12: Large Scale Spring Training
quests.description: Score 8 victories in practice mode in a single day.

quests.description_ja: 春の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
quests.title: C13: Raise the Transport Unit's Experience!
quests.description: Score 4 victories in practice mode in a single day. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊を「遠征」に出発させよう！
quests.title: D1: First Expedition
quests.description: Perform an expedition.

quests.description_ja: 本日中に「遠征」３回成功させよう！
quests.title: D2d1: Complete 3 Expeditions
quests.description: Perform 3 successful expeditions within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 本日中に「遠征」10回成功させよう！
quests.title: D3d2: Complete 10 Expeditions
quests.description: Perform 10 successful expeditions within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 今週中に「遠征」30回成功させよう！
quests.title: D4w1: Large-scale Expedition Operation
quests.description: Perform 30 successful expeditions within the same week.

quests.description_ja: はじめての潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させよう！
quests.title_ja: 第一次潜水艦派遣作戦
quests.title: D5: The First Submarine Operation
quests.description: Complete Expedition 30 (潜水艦派遣作戦).

quests.description_ja: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させよう！
quests.title_ja: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦
quests.title: D6: The Second Submarine Operation
quests.description: Complete Expedition 30 (潜水艦派遣作戦) one more time.

quests.description_ja: 第三次及び第四次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させ、他国製技術の導入に努めよ！
quests.title_ja: 潜水艦派遣作戦による技術入手の継続！
quests.title: D7: Continuation of Submarine Operations
quests.description: Complete Expedition 30 (潜水艦派遣作戦) two more times.

quests.description_ja: 有力な潜水艦隊派遣による海外艦との接触作戦を成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 潜水艦派遣による海外艦との接触作戦
quests.title: D8: Strategy Meeting with Overseas Submarine Dispatch
quests.description: Complete expedition 31 (海外艦との接触) and receive foreign destroyer Z1!

quests.description_ja: 激戦海域である南方海域への「東京急行」系遠征を敢行、これを成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 南方への輸送作戦を成功させよ！
quests.title: D9w2: Transportation Towards South
quests.description: Complete expedition 37 or 38 (東京急行).

quests.description_ja: 今週中に「東京急行」系遠征を継続的に実施、同種作戦を7回成功させよう！
quests.title_ja: 南方への鼠輸送を継続実施せよ！
quests.title: D11w3: Transportation Towards South (Cont.)
quests.description: Complete expedition 37 or 38 (東京急行) a total of 7 times in a week.

quests.description_ja: 「航空戦艦運用演習」を実施し、航空火力艦の運用の強化に努めよ！
quests.title_ja: 航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
quests.title: D10: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV
quests.description: Complete expedition 23 (航空戦艦運用演習).

quests.description_ja: 「航空戦艦運用演習」を継続実施し、航空火力艦の運用の強化に引き続き努めよ！
quests.title_ja: (続)航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
quests.title: D12: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV (Cont.)
quests.description: Complete expedition 23 (航空戦艦運用演習) 4 more times.

quests.description_ja: 「遠洋潜水艦作戦」を実施し、潜水艦隊の練度向上と敵艦隊漸減に努めよ！
quests.title_ja: 遠洋潜水艦作戦を実施せよ！
quests.title: D13: Blue Waters Submarine Operation
quests.description: Complete expedition 39 (遠洋潜水艦作戦).

quests.description_ja: 「遠洋潜水艦作戦」を継続実施し、潜水艦隊の練度向上と敵艦隊漸減に努めよ！
quests.title_ja: 遠洋潜水艦作戦の成果を拡大せよ！
quests.title: D14: Blue Waters Extended Submarine Operation
quests.description: Complete expedition 39 (遠洋潜水艦作戦) 2 more times.

quests.description_ja: 「防空射撃演習」を複数回実施し、艦隊の防空能力を高めよ！
quests.title_ja: 防空射撃演習を実施せよ！
quests.title: D15: Air Defence Exercises
quests.description: Complete expedition 6 (防空射撃演習) 3 times.

quests.description_ja: 「囮機動部隊支援作戦」を実施し、これを成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 囮機動部隊支援作戦を実施せよ！
quests.title: D16: Deploy the Decoy Task Force
quests.description: Complete expedition 15 (囮機動部隊支援作戦).

quests.description_ja: 観艦式を実施する。予行として「観艦式予行」を複数回実施し、これを2回成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 観艦式予行を実施せよ！
quests.title: D17: Naval Ceremony Preparations
quests.description: Complete expedition 7 (観艦式予行) 2 times.

quests.description_ja: 練度の高い艦隊で観艦式本番を実施する。「観艦式」を実施し、これを成功させよ！
quests.title: D18: Naval Review
quests.description: Complete expedition 8 (観艦式).

quests.description_ja: 機動部隊遠征を実施、「MO作戦」及び「敵母港空襲作戦」を展開、これを成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 機動部隊の運用を強化せよ！
quests.title: D19: Strengthen the Carrier Task Force Operations
quests.description: Complete expeditions 26 (MO作戦) and 35 (敵母港空襲作戦).

quests.description_ja: 期間限定海域において、海外からの親善艦を招いて特別観艦式を実施せよ！
quests.title_ja: 親善艦参加観艦式を実施せよ！
quests.title: Carry out a Friendly Ship Naval Review
quests.description: Complete expedition 175.

quests.description_ja: 潜水艦派遣作戦により、新型航空機技術の導入に努めよ！
quests.title_ja: 潜水艦派遣作戦による航空機技術入手
quests.title: D20: Obtain Airplane Technology from Submarine Dispatch Operation
quests.description: Send a submarine fleet of 4 or more submarines to Expedition 30 and Expedition 31 and successfully complete them.

quests.description_ja:
鉄鋼5,000及びボーキサイト1,500を準備して、潜水艦派遣作戦により
噴式エンジン技術の導入に努めよ！※任務達成後、準備した資源は消費します。
quests.title_ja: 潜水艦派遣作戦による噴式技術の入手
quests.title: D21: Obtain Jet Engine Technology from Submarine Dispatch Operation
quests.description: Send a submarine fleet of 4 or more submarines to Expedition 30 and Expedition 31 and successfully complete them. 5000 steel and 1500 bauxite will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja: 遠征任務：「海上護衛任務」を反復実施し、輸送船団の護衛に務めよ！
quests.title_ja: 輸送船団護衛を強化せよ！
quests.title: D22: Reinforce the Transport Escort!
quests.description: Successfully complete Expedition 5 a total of 4 times.

quests.description_ja:
遠征任務：遠征任務「対潜警戒任務」「海上護衛任務」「タンカー護衛任務」を実施、
軽巡、駆逐艦、海防艦などから編成された護衛艦隊で各遠征を成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 海上護衛総隊、遠征開始！
quests.title: D23: Surface Escort Fleets, Commence Expeditions!
quests.description: Organize a fleet consisting of only CL, DD and DE and successfully complete Expedition 4,5, and 9.

quests.title: D24: Stay Alert on the Maritime Routes!
quests.description: Complete Expedition 3, 4, 5 and 10.

quests.title: D25: Reinforce the Expedition Resupply Support Regime!
quests.description: Complete Expedition A1 and have 800 steel in your inventory. Steel will be consumed upon completion.

quests.title: D26: Suppress the Submurged Enemy Fleet Invading the Costal Waters!
quests.description: Complete Expeditions 4, A2, and A3 two times each.

quests.title: D27: Making Preparations for Operation Shou-Gou 1!
quests.description: Complete Expeditions 3, A1, and B1 one time each.

quests.description_ja: 補給は大事です！燃料・弾薬を艦に「補給」しよう！
quests.title: E1: First Supply
quests.description: Resupply a ship.

quests.description_ja: 戦闘で傷ついた艦を「入渠」させて修理して、次の出撃に備えよう！
quests.title: E2: First Docking
quests.description: Repair a ship.

quests.description_ja: 各艦隊から整備が必要な艦を5隻以上ドック入りさせ、大規模な整備をしよう！
quests.title: E3d1: Daily Repairs
quests.description: Repair 5 ships.

quests.description_ja: 艦隊酒保祭り！各艦に延べ15回以上の補給を実施しよう！
quests.title: E4d2: Daily Resupplies
quests.description: Resupply your ships 15 times.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で鋼材などの資材を使って新しい艦を「建造」しよう！
quests.title: F1: First Construction
quests.description: Craft a ship.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」でボーキサイトなどの資材を使って新しい装備アイテムを「開発」しよう！
quests.title: F2: First Development
quests.description: Craft a piece of equipment.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で不要な艦を「解体」してみよう！
quests.title: F3: First Dismantlement
quests.description: Dismantle a ship.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で不要な装備アイテムを「廃棄」してみよう！
quests.title: F4: First Scrapping
quests.description: Scrap a piece of equipment.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを新たに「開発」しよう(失敗もOK)！
quests.title: F5d1: Develop New Equipment
quests.description: Craft a piece of equipment. (Failures are OK)

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で艦娘を本日中に新たに「建造」しよう！
quests.title: F6d2: Construct New Ship
quests.description: Craft a ship.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを本日中に3回「開発」しよう(失敗もOK)！
quests.title: F7d3: Develop More Equipment
quests.description: Craft 3 pieces of equipment. (Failures are OK)

quests.description_ja: 艦隊強化のため、「工廠」で艦娘を本日中に3隻「建造」しよう！
quests.title: F8d4: Construct More New Ships
quests.description: Craft 3 ships.

quests.description_ja: 少し艦隊規模が大きくなりすぎました！「工廠」で不要な艦を2隻「解体」してください！
quests.title: F9d5: Dismantlement Duty
quests.description: Scrap 2 ships.

quests.description_ja: 大型艦建造の準備をします！「工廠」で装備アイテムを4回「廃棄」してみてください！
quests.title: F10: Preparation for LSC (Part 2)
quests.description: Scrap equipment 4 times.

quests.description_ja: 式の準備をします！「工廠」で装備アイテムを2回「廃棄」して身の回りの整理を！
quests.title: WF01: In Preparation of Love (Part 1)
quests.description: Scrap equipment 2 times to show your love!

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを3回「廃棄」して、輸送用のドラム缶を準備します。
quests.title_ja: 輸送用ドラム缶の準備
quests.title: F11: Prepare the Drum Canisters
quests.description: Scrap equipment 3 times to acquire a shipping barrel.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で余剰の装備アイテムをなるべく多く「廃棄」して、鋼材の再利用に努めよう！
quests.title: F12w: Recycling Resources
quests.description: Scrap equipment 24 times.

quests.description_ja: 「九七式艦攻(友永隊)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「天山」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F13: Model Conversion (to Tenzan)
quests.description: With an aircraft carrier equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron) as your secretary, scrap 2 Tenzans (simultaneously) to upgrade the Type 97 to Tenzan Model 12 (Tomonaga Squadron). The Type 97 must not be locked or you'll lose the Tenzans.

quests.description_ja: 「九九式艦爆(江草隊)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「彗星」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F14: Model Conversion (to Suisei)
quests.description: With an aircraft carrier equipped with Type 99 Dive Bomber (Ekusa Squadron) as your secretary, scrap 2 Suiseis (simultaneously) to upgrade the Type 99 to Suisei (Ekusa Squadron). The Type 99 must not be locked or you'll lose the Suiseis.

quests.description_ja: 「零戦52型丙(六〇一空)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「烈風」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F15: Model Conversion (to Reppuu)
quests.description: With an aircraft carrier equipped with Zero Fighter Type 52 Type C (601 Air Group) as your secretary, scrap 2 Reppuus to upgrade the Type 52 to Reppuu (601 Air Group). The Type 52 must not be locked or you'll lose the Reppuus.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で不要な装備アイテムをいくつか「廃棄」して、新型給糧艦召喚の準備をしましょう！
quests.title: F16: Preparing for Irako
quests.description: Scrap equipment 10 times.

quests.description_ja: 「改修工廠」で「装備」を改修してみましょう！明石さん、お願いします！
quests.title: F17: First Equipment Modernisation
quests.description: Perform equipment modernisation once.

quests.description_ja: 「改修工廠」で「装備」の改修強化に努めます。
quests.title: F18d6: Improve Equipment
quests.description: Perform equipment modernisation once.

quests.description_ja: 「九七式艦攻(村田隊)」搭載「翔鶴」を秘書艦にして、新たに「天山」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F19: Model Conversion
quests.description: With Shoukaku equipped with a Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)‎ as your secretary, scrap 2 Tenzans to upgrade the Type 97 to Tenzan Model 12 (Murata Squadron).

quests.description_ja: 「翔鶴」または「赤城」を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「九七式艦攻」を3つ廃棄！
quests.title_ja: 精鋭「九七式艦攻」部隊の編成
quests.title: F20: Formation of the Elite Type 97 Torpedo Bomber Squadron
quests.description: With Shoukaku (翔鶴) or Akagi (赤城) as your secretary, dismantle 3 Type 97 Torpedo Bombers to obtain a Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron).

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを7つ「廃棄」して、「試製甲板カタパルト」を準備します。
quests.title: F21: Prototype Flight Deck Outfitting Preparations
quests.description: Scrap 7 pieces of equipment.

quests.description_ja: 要熟練搭乗員：練度max「零戦21型」搭載「鳳翔」秘書艦で「零戦21型」x2「九六艦戦」x1廃棄！
quests.title: F22: Reorganisation of the Fighter Forces
quests.description: With Houshou (鳳翔) as the secretary equipped with a Type 21 Zero Fighter (零戦21型) at maximum skill level, scrap two Type 21 Zero Fighters (零戦21型) and a Type 96 Fighter (九六艦戦). Requires and consumes 1 Skilled Pilot.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを9つ「廃棄」して、「試製甲板カタパルト」を追加試作します。
quests.title_ja: 試製航空艤装の追加試作
quests.title: F23: Additional Prototype Deck Outfitting
quests.description: Scrap 9 pieces of equipment.

quests.description_ja: 「零戦21型(熟練)」搭載空母を秘書艦にして、新たに「零戦52型」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F24: Model Conversion
quests.description: With an aircraft carrier equipped with Type 21 Zero Fighter (Skilled) (零戦21型(熟練)) as your secretary, scrap two Type 52 Zero Fighters (零戦52型).

quests.description_ja: 練度max「零戦21型(熟練)」搭載空母を秘書艦にして、新たに「零戦52型」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F25: Model Conversion
quests.description: With an aircraft carrier equipped with Type 21 Zero Fighter (Skilled) (零戦21型(熟練)) at maximum skill level as your secretary, scrap two Type 52 Zero Fighters (零戦52型).

quests.description_ja: 練度max「零戦52型(熟練)」搭載「瑞鶴」秘書艦で「零戦52型丙(六〇一空)」を廃棄！
quests.title: F26: Reorganisation of the Fighter Forces
quests.description: With Zuikaku equipped with Type 52 Zero Fighter (Skilled) (零戦52型(熟練)) at maximum skill level as your secretary, scrap a Type 52-C Zero Fighter (601 Air Group) (零戦52型丙(六〇一空)).

quests.description_ja: 練度max「零戦21型(熟練)」搭載「瑞鶴」が秘書の状態で、「零戦21型」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F28: Reorganisation of the Fighter Forces
quests.description: With Zuikaku equipped with Type 21 Zero Fighter (Skilled) (零戦21型(熟練)) at maximum skill level as your secretary, scrap two Type 21 Zero Fighters (零戦21型).

quests.description_ja: 練度max「零戦52型丙(付岩井小隊)」搭載「瑞鶴」秘書艦で、「零戦62型(爆戦)」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F27: Model Conversion and Force Reorganisation
quests.description: With Zuikaku equipped with Type 52-C Zero Fighter (Iwai Squadron) (零戦52型丙(付岩井小隊)) at maximum skill level as your secretary, scrap two Type 62 Zero Fighter-bombers (零戦62型(爆戦)).

quests.description_ja: 練度max「零戦21型(付岩本小隊)」搭載「瑞鶴」秘書艦で、「零戦52型」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F29: Model Conversion
quests.description: With Zuikaku equipped with Type 21 Zero Fighter (Iwamoto Squadron) (零戦21型(付岩本小隊)) at maximum skill level as your secretary, scrap two Type 52 Zero Fighters (零戦52型).

quests.description_ja: 部隊を再編する！練度max「零戦52型甲(付岩本小隊)」搭載「瑞鶴」秘書艦で、「彩雲」を2つ廃棄！
quests.title: F30: Model Conversion and Force Reorganisation
quests.description: With Zuikaku equipped with Type 52-A Zero Fighter (Iwamoto Squadron) (零戦52型甲(付岩本小隊)) at maximum skill level as your secretary, scrap two Saiuns (彩雲).

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを9つ「廃棄」して、新家具の準備をします。
quests.title: F31: Preparation for New Furniture
quests.description: Scrap 9 pieces of equipment.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを5つ「廃棄」して、新装備配備の準備をします。
quests.title: F32: Preparation for New Equipment
quests.description: Scrap 5 pieces of equipment.

quests.description_ja: 「工廠」で「7.7mm機銃」及び「12.7mm単装機銃」を二つずつ廃棄！
quests.title_ja: 上陸戦用新装備の調達
quests.title: F33: New Equipment for the Landing Force
quests.description: Scrap two 7.7mm Machine Guns and two 12.7mm Machine Guns.

quests.description_ja:
勲章x2消費：「鳳翔」秘書艦に練度max及び改修max「九六式艦戦」を搭載、熟練搭乗員を養成せよ！
(任務達成後、部隊は消滅します)
quests.title: F35: Skilled Pilot Training
quests.description: Consumes 2 medals. Appoint Houshou as the secretary ship and equip her with a Type 96 Fighter at maximum rank and upgrade level.

quests.description_ja: 「機銃」系装備を量産し、工廠で6個廃棄！ 「装備改修」強化をサポートせよ！
quests.title: F34: Mass Production of Autocannons
quests.description: Scrap 6 anti-air guns.

quests.description_ja:
勲章x2消費：「島風」秘書艦に改修max「61cm五連装(酸素)魚雷」と
改修max「61cm三連装(酸素)魚雷」を装備！(任務達成後、各装備は消滅します)
quests.title: F36: Torpedo Development
quests.description: Consumes 2 medals. Appoint Shimakaze as your secretary and equip her with a 61cm Triple Oxygen Torpedo and a 61cm Quintuple Oxygen Torpedo (both at maximum upgrade level). The equipped torpedoes will be consumed.

quests.description_ja: 不要な装備を複数「廃棄」して、夏を迎える準備をしましょう！
quests.title: Preparing for Early Summer
quests.description: Scrap 5 pieces of equipment.

quests.description_ja: 「航空基地設営」の事前準備を開始する。「ドラム缶(輸送用)」を二つ「工廠」で廃棄し、「7.7mm機銃」及び「九六式艦戦」を各二つずつ用意せよ！(任務達成後、用意した必要装備は消滅します)
quests.title: F37: Air Base Construction Preparations
quests.description: Scrap 2 drum canisters (ドラム缶(輸送用)) and have 2 Type 96 Fighters (九六式艦戦) and 2 7.7mm Machine Guns (7.7mm機銃) in your inventory. The equipment must be unlocked and will be consumed upon quest completion.

quests.description_ja:
「基地航空隊」開設に向け、「陸攻」の追加調達を行う。「7.7mm機銃」及び
「九九式艦爆」を各二つずつ準備せよ！(任務達成後、同装備は消滅します)
quests.title: F38: Boost the Land-based Attack Squadron
quests.description: Have 2 7.7mm Machine Guns (7.7mm機銃) and 2 Type 99 Dive Bombers (九九式艦爆) in your equipment. The equipment must be unlocked and will be consumed upon quest completion.

quests.description_ja:
主力陸上攻撃機「一式陸攻」の新規調達を行う。「零式艦戦21型」を二つ「工廠」で廃棄し、
「九六式陸攻」一つと「九七式艦攻」二つを準備せよ！(任務達成後、用意した必要装備は消滅します)
quests.title: F39: Land-Based Attack Aircraft Production
quests.description: Scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 aircraft and have 1 Type 96 Land-based Attack Aircraft and 2 Type 97 Torpedo Bombers in your inventory. The equipment must be unlocked and will be consumed upon quest completion. You will receive a Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft as a reward. This is a quarterly quest.

quests.description_ja:
「一式陸攻」性能向上型の配備を行う。「一式陸攻」一つと「天山」二つを準備せよ！
(任務達成後、用意した必要装備は消滅します/「一式陸攻」の熟練度は継承されます)
quests.title_ja: 「一式陸攻」性能向上型の調達
quests.title: F40: Improved Land-Based Attack Aircraft Construction
quests.description: Have 1 Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft and 2 Tenzans in your inventory. The equipment must be unlocked and will be consumed upon quest completion. You will receive a Type 1 Model 22A Land-based Attack Aircraft as a reward.

quests.description_ja:
「三式弾」一つを廃棄し、燃料750及び弾薬750と「ドラム缶(輸送用)」二つと「九一式徹甲弾」一つを
用意せよ！※任務達成後、用意した資源及び必要装備(徹甲弾は改修値の低いもの優先)は消滅します。
quests.title: F41: Off-Shore Resupply Production
quests.description: Scrap 1 Type 3 Shell and have 750 fuel and ammo, 2 Drum Canisters, and 1 Type 91 AP Shell in your inventory. The equipment must be unlocked and will be consumed upon quest completion. The Type 91 AP Shell consumed will be the one with the lowest upgrade level.

quests.description_ja:
「25mm単装機銃」一つを廃棄、家具コイン5,000と「25mm連装機銃」及び「25mm三連装機銃」を各
二つ準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(改修値の低いもの優先)は消滅します。
quests.title: F42: Custom Furniture Production
quests.description: Scrap 1 25mm Single Autocannon Mount and have 2 25mm Twin Autocannon Mounts, 2 25mm Triple Autocannon Mounts, and 5000 furniture coins. The equipment must be unlocked and will be consumed (prioritising the lowest upgrade level items) upon quest completion. You will receive a Furniture Fairy as a reward.

quests.description_ja:
「ドラム缶(輸送用)」二つを廃棄、燃料1200及びボーキサイト3000、さらに「設営隊」一つを準備せよ！
※任務達成後、用意した資源及び「設営隊」は消滅します。
quests.title_ja: 中部海域「基地航空隊」展開！
quests.title: F43: Getting Ready to Build the Air Base
quests.description: Scrap 2 Drum Canisters and have 1200 fuel, 3000 bauxite, and a construction team in your inventory. The resources and items will be consumed upon quest completion.

quests.description_ja: 「12.7cm連装高角砲」二つを廃棄し、家具コイン5,000と「14cm単装砲」及び「15.2cm単装砲」を各二つずつ準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(低改修を優先)は消費します。
quests.title: F44: Procurement of Custom-Made Furniture
quests.description: Scrap 2 12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mounts and have 5000 furniture tokens, 2 14cm Naval Guns and 2 15.2cm Naval Guns in your inventory while the quest is activated.

quests.description_ja:
新機軸の偵察機の調達を行う。「零式水上偵察機」を二つ「工廠」で廃棄し、
「一式陸攻」一つと「彩雲」二つを準備せよ！(任務達成後、用意した必要装備は消費します)
quests.title: F45: Develop the New Reconnaissance Plane
quests.description: Scrap 2 Type 0 Recon Seaplanes and have 1 Type 1 Land Attacker and 2 Saiuns in your inventory. These items will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja: ネ式エンジンを搭載した新型戦闘爆撃機の開発を行う。「紫電改二」三つを「工廠」で廃棄し、「新型航空機設計図」二つと「ネ式エンジン」一つを準備せよ！(任務達成後、用意した必要アイテムは消費します)
quests.title_ja: 噴式戦闘爆撃機の開発
quests.title: F46: Develop the Jet Fighter-Bomber
quests.description: Scrap 3 Shiden Kai 2 and have 2 New Aircraft Blueprints and 1 Ne-Type Engine in your inventory. These iItems will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja: 噴式航空機生産のため、ネ式エンジンの増産を行う。「零式艦戦52型」三つを「工廠」で廃棄し、「流星」「烈風」各二つと鉄鋼8,000を準備せよ！※任務達成後、用意した必要装備と資源は消費します。
quests.title: F47: Boost the Production of Ne-Type Engines
quests.description: Scrap 3 Type 52 Zero Fighters and have two Reppuu, two Ryuusei and 8,000 steel in your inventory. Items will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja:
主砲「12.7cm連装砲」を二つ廃棄、家具コイン5,000と「7.7mm機銃」及び「九六式艦戦」各二つずつ
準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
quests.title: F48: Procurement of Custom-Made Furniture
quests.description: Scrap 2x 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount and prepare 5000 furniture coins, 2x 7.7mm Machine Gun and 2x Type 96 Fighter. Items will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja: 「20.3cm連装砲(無印)」を二つ廃棄、家具コイン5,000と「12cm単装砲」「零式水上偵察機」各二つを準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
quests.title_ja: 節分特別任務：節分準備！
quests.title: SF2: Special Setsubun Quest: Setsubun Preperation!
quests.description: Scrap 2 20.3cm Twin Gun Mounts and prepare 5000 Furniture Tokens, 2 12cm Naval Guns and 2 Type 0 Recon Seaplanes in your inventory. Lowest-star items will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja: 彩雲調達＆分解任務：「零式水上偵察機」一つを廃棄、開発資材x10と「九七式艦上攻撃機(無印)」一つを準備せよ！※任務達成後、用意した開発資材及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
quests.title: Disassemble and Transport the Saiun
quests.description: No one will ever know

quests.description_ja: 秘書艦に「伊401」または「伊14」または「伊13」を配備。「晴嵐」を一番スロットに搭載。「瑞雲(六三一空)」を二番スロットに搭載。「晴嵐(六三一空)」を新編せよ！　※任務達成後瑞雲は消滅します。
quests.title_ja: 六三一空「晴嵐」隊の編成
quests.title: F49: Organize the Seiran 631 Air Group
quests.description: Have I-401, I-13 or I-14 as your secretary and equip the secretary with a Prototype Seiran in the first slot and a Zuiun (631 Air Group) in the second slot.

quests.description_ja: 春の準備任務：「14cm単装砲」を二つ廃棄、家具コイン5,000と「九九式艦爆」「61cm三連装魚雷」各二つを準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
quests.title_ja: 春の準備任務：桃の節句準備！
quests.title: SF3: Spring Preparation Mission: Hina Matsuri Preparations!
quests.description: Scrap 2 14cm Naval Gun and have 5000 furniture coins and 2 Type 99 Dive Bombers and 2 61cm Triple Torpedo Mounts in your inventory. Items will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja: 「61cm三連装魚雷」を四つ廃棄、開発資材x120と「61cm四連装(酸素)魚雷」「九三式水中聴音機」各三つを準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した開発資材及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
quests.title: F50: Enhance Submarine Armaments
quests.description: Scrap 4 61cm Triple Torpedo Mounts and have 120 development materials, 3 61cm Quad (Oxygen) Torpedo Mounts and 3 Type 93 SONARs in your inventory. Items will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja:
精鋭飛行隊の新編成：練度max及び改修maxの「二式水戦改」を一番スロットに搭載した秘書艦で、
「零式艦戦21型」x2「瑞雲」x2を廃棄！　※新飛行隊を編成する「熟練搭乗員」が必要です。
quests.title: F51: Organize the New Elite Seaplane Group
quests.description: Have a secretary ship equipped with a Maxed Proficiency and Max Star Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai in the first slot and then Scrap 2 Type 21 Zero Fighter and 2 Zuiun in your inventory. Requires and consumes 1 Skilled Pilot.

quests.description_ja:
精鋭飛行隊の増勢：練度max及び改修maxの「二式水戦改」を一番スロットに搭載した秘書艦で、
「零式艦戦21型」x2「瑞雲」x2を廃棄！　※新飛行隊を編成する「熟練搭乗員」が必要です。
quests.title: F52: Expand the New Elite Seaplane Group
quests.description: Have a secretary ship equipped with a Maxed Proficiency and Max Star Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai in the first slot and then Scrap 2 Type 21 Zero Fighter and 2 Zuiun in your inventory. Requires and consumes 1 Skilled Pilot.

quests.description_ja:
工廠任務：新型砲墳兵装の開発及び同戦力化を開始する。「副砲」系装備x10を廃棄、
鉄鋼6,000を準備せよ！　※任務達成後、準備した資源は消費します。
quests.title_ja: 新型砲墳兵装、戦力化開始！
quests.title: F53: Begin Strengthening the New Type Gun Armament!
quests.description: Scrap 10 Secondary Guns and have 6000 steel. Steel will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja:
工廠任務：新型艤装の開発研究を実施する。「中口径主砲」系装備x10を廃棄、鉄鋼12,000を準備せよ！
※任務達成後、準備した資源は消費します。「勲章」と「新型砲熕兵装資材」の獲得選択が可能です。
quests.title: F54: Development Research of New Rigging Types
quests.description: Scrap 10 Medium-Sized Guns and have 12000 steel. Steel will be consumed upon completion. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.description_ja:
工廠任務：新型艤装の開発を継続実施する。「大口径主砲」系装備x10を廃棄、鉄鋼18,000を準備せよ！
※任務達成後、準備した資源は消費します。「勲章」と「新型砲熕兵装資材」の獲得選択が可能です。
quests.title: F55: Continued Research of New Rigging Types
quests.description: Scrap 10 Large-Caliber Main Guns and have 18000 steel. Steel will be consumed upon completion. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: F56: Utilize RADAR Technology for Shooting Equipment
quests.description: Scrap 10 RADARs and have 8000 ammo and steel. Ammo and steel will be consumed upon completion. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: F57: Cooperation of the Consumer Industry
quests.description: Scrap 16 Small Caliber Guns and have 12000 fuel. Fuel will be consumed upon completion. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: F58: Organize the Elite Zuiun Group
quests.description: Have Hyuuga Kai as a secretary ship equipped with a Max Star Zuiun (634 Air Group) in her fourth slot and 2 Type 99 Dive Bombers and 2 Zuiun in your inventory and then Scrap 2 Drum Canisters. Requires and consumes 1 Skilled Pilot.

quests.title: F59: Continue your cooperation with the Consumer Industry!
quests.description: Scrap 10 Anti-Aircraft Guns and have 15000 steel. Steel will be consumed upon completion. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: F60: The Start of the Special Combat Rations
quests.description: Prepare 2 Combat Rations, 800 fuel and 150 bauxite. Resources will be consumed upon completion.

quests.title: F61: Development of the Carrier-Based Night Fighter
quests.description: Have a Max Star and Max Proficiency F6F-3 equipped on your secretary ship in her first slot and have 30 Development materials, 6 screws, 5000 bauxite and 1 New Aviation Armament Materials in your inventory. Then scrap 2 Type 13 Air RADARs and 2 Type 22 Surface RADARs. Items will be consumed on completion.

quests.title: F62:  Development of Carrier-Based Night Bombers
quests.description: Have a TBF equipped on your secretary ship in her first slot and have 40 Development materials, 10 screws, 8000 bauxite, 1 Skilled Pilot and 1 New Aviation Armament Materials in your inventory. Then scrap 2 Type 13 Air RADARs and 2 Type 22 Surface RADARs. Items will be consumed on completion.

quests.title: F63: Improve the Performance of the Carrier-Based Night Fighter
quests.description: Have a Max Star and Max Proficiency F6F-5 equipped on your secretary ship in her first slot and have 40 Development materials, 8 screws, 8000 bauxite and 1 New Aviation Armament Materials in your inventory. Then scrap 2 Type 13 Air RADARs and 2 Type 22 Surface RADARs. Items will be consumed on completion.

quests.description_ja: 任意の艦を近代化改修(合成)して、強化せよ！
quests.title_ja: はじめての「近代化改修」！
quests.title: G1: First Modernization
quests.description: Perform a successful modernization.

quests.description_ja: 近代化改修を実施して、２回以上これを成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 艦の「近代化改修」を実施せよ！
quests.title: G2d: Ship Modernizations
quests.description: Perform 2 successful modernizations within the same day.

quests.description_ja: 一週間の間に、近代化改修を１5回成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 「近代化改修」を進め、戦備を整えよ！
quests.title: G3w: Proceed with Modernizations
quests.description: Perform 15 successful modernizations within the same week.

quests.description_ja: 大型艦/新型艦建造のための準備を行う。任意の艦で近代化改修を4回成功させよ！
quests.title: G4: Preparation for LSC (Part 1)
quests.description: Perform 4 successful modernizations.

quests.description_ja:
鉄鋼5,500及びボーキサイト2,500を準備して、任意の正規空母の近代化改修を
[航空母艦]x5隻同時使用により2回成功させよ！※任務達成後、準備した資源は消費します。
quests.title_ja: 航空艤装の近代化改修
quests.title: G5: Modernisation Improvement of Flight Rigging
quests.description: Modernise a Standard Carrier using a total of 5 CVL/CV for each modernisation two times while the quest is activated. 5500 steel and 2500 bauxite will be consumed upon completion.

quests.description_ja: 水雷戦隊を製油所地帯沿岸に展開！同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅、新年の暁に勝利を刻むのです！
quests.title_ja: 謹賀新年！「水雷戦隊」出撃始め！
quests.title: Happy New Year! Sortie the Torpedo Squadron
quests.description: Sortie a light cruiser and five destroyers to World 1-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 大丈夫、新年は収集任務じゃないんです！東部オリョール海の敵艦隊を三回撃滅してください！
quests.title_ja: 新年の「伊良湖」のお手伝い！
quests.title: Helping Irako Organize New Year Celebrations
quests.description: Sortie a fleet to World 2-3 and score three S rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 戦艦4隻を基幹戦力とする艦隊をカレー洋へ展開！敵艦隊を反復撃滅し、同海域を制圧せよ！
quests.title_ja: 漲る戦艦魂！大艦巨砲なお正月！
quests.title: Display of the Fleet's Strength: Battleships, Set Sail
quests.description: Sortie 4 battleships and two additional ships to World 4-2 and score two S rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 空母2隻を基幹戦力とする機動部隊をMS諸島沖に展開、来襲する敵攻略部隊を反復撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 迎春！「機動部隊」抜錨せよ！
quests.title: New Year's Greetings! Mobilisation of the Carrier Task Force
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with 2 standard fleet carriers to World 6-2 and score two S rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 旗艦「霞改二」で駆逐艦4隻を含む艦隊を北方海域に投入し、モーレイ海哨戒を実施せよ！
quests.title_ja: 旗艦「霞」北方海域を哨戒せよ！
quests.title: B58: Send Kasumi to Patrol the Northern Sea
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Kasumi Kai2 (霞改二) as the flagship, 3 destroyers and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score a victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 旗艦「霞改二」で駆逐艦3隻を含む艦隊で南西諸島沖ノ島沖に突入！敵主力を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 旗艦「霞」出撃！敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B59: Sortie Kasumi and Defeat the Enemy Fleet
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Kasumi Kai2 (霞改二) as the flagship, 2 destroyers and up to 3 additional ships to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 第三十一戦隊(第一次)を鎮守府近海航路に出撃させ、同航路の安全確保に努めよ！
quests.title: B60: Deploy the 31st Squadron (1st Gen.)
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Isuzu Kai2 (五十鈴改二) as the flagship, Satsuki Kai2 (皐月改二) and Uzuki Kai (卯月改) and up to 3 additional ships to World 1-6 and complete the map.

quests.description_ja: 「白露改」旗艦の第二七戦隊を含む艦隊をオリョール海に展開、同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B61: Sortie the 27th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie Shiratsuyu Kai (白露改) as the flagship, Shigure (時雨), Harusame (春雨), Samidare (五月雨) and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 中部海域における航空偵察「K作戦」を実施しつつ、強襲上陸作戦用戦力の強化を図れ！
quests.title_ja: 強襲上陸作戦用戦力を増強せよ！
quests.title: B62: Bolster the Capability for Amphibious Assault Operations
quests.description: Sortie to World 6-3 and score at least a B rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 水雷戦隊を製油所地帯沿岸に展開！同海域に出没する敵艦隊を三回以上撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 製油所地帯を防衛せよ！
quests.title: B63: Protect the Oil Refinery Area
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a light cruiser and 5 destroyers to World 1-3 and score 3 S rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 南西諸島防衛線に有力な艦隊を展開、同方面に来襲する敵艦隊を五回以上撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 南西諸島防衛線を強化せよ！
quests.title: B64: Reinforce the Nansei Islands Defence Line
quests.description: Sortie to World 1-4 and score 5 S rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 大潮を旗艦とする艦隊を東部オリョール海に反復出撃、同方面敵艦隊を完全撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: オリョール海の制海権を確保せよ！
quests.title: B65: Establish Naval Supremacy at the Orel Sea
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Ooshio (大潮) as the flagship and up to 5 additional ships to World 2-3 and score 6 S rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「大潮改二」旗艦の有力な艦隊を北方AL海域に展開、北方海域戦闘哨戒を実施せよ！
quests.title: B66: Sortie the Flagship Ooshio
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Ooshio Kai2 (大潮改二) as the flagship and up to 5 additional ships to World 3-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「江風改二」「時雨改二」「川内改二」他駆逐2隻を含む艦隊で、ジャム島攻略作戦を実施せよ！
quests.title_ja: 強行高速輸送部隊、出撃せよ！
quests.title: B68: Sortie the High-Speed Transport Fleet
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Kawakaze Kai2 (江風改二), Shigure Kai2 (時雨改二), Sendai Kai2 (川内改二), two more destroyers (you can add another ship of any class to this fleet) to World 4-1 and score an A or S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 旗艦「赤城」同僚艦「加賀」を中核とする艦隊で、深海東洋艦隊漸減作戦を貫徹せよ！
quests.title: B69: Sortie the First Carrier Division to the West
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Akagi (赤城) as the flagship, Kaga (加賀) and up to 4 additional ships to World 4-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 三周年を記念しバシー島沖及び東部オリョール海に出撃、同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title: B67: Three Years Anniversary
quests.description: Sortie to Worlds 2-2 and 2-3 and score S rank victories at the boss nodes.

quests.description_ja: 水雷戦隊を含む新編艦隊を南西諸島防衛線に展開、同方面に来襲する敵艦隊を撃破せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編艦隊、南西諸島防衛線へ急行せよ！
quests.title: B70: Set Sail Towards the Nansei Islands Defence Line
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a light cruiser flagship and 4 destroyers to World 1-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 水雷戦隊を含む新編艦隊を鎮守府近海航路に出撃させ、同航路の安全確保に努めよ！
quests.title_ja: 鎮守府近海航路の安全確保を強化せよ！
quests.title: B71: Ensure the Safety of the Naval Base's Nearby Routes
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a light cruiser flagship and 4 destroyers to World 1-6 and complete the map.

quests.description_ja: 第三十一戦隊(第一次)を鎮守府近海航路に再投入！反復出撃し、敵潜を制圧せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第三十一戦隊」敵潜を制圧せよ！
quests.title: B72: 31st Squadron's Anti-Submarine Operation
quests.description: Sortie Isuzu Kai2 (五十鈴改二) as the flagship, Satsuki Kai2 (皐月改二), Uzuki (卯月) and 3 additional ships to World 1-6 and clear the map twice.

quests.description_ja: 新編「第八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊を鎮守府近海航路に出撃させ、同航路の安全確保に努めよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
quests.title: B73: Sortie the New 8th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie Asashio Kai2 (朝潮改二) as the flagship, Michishio (満潮), Ooshio (大潮), Arashio (荒潮) and up to 2 additional ships to World 1-6 and clear the map.

quests.description_ja: 「第八駆逐隊第一小隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面対潜哨戒を反復実施！敵潜を圧倒せよ！
quests.title_ja: 精鋭「八駆第一小隊」対潜哨戒！
quests.title: B74: Sortie the Elite Forces of the 8th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie Asashio Kai2 D (朝潮改二丁), Ooshio Kai2 (大潮改二) and 2 additional ships to World 1-5 and score two A (or better) rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 有力な艦隊を沖ノ島海域前面に反復投入、侵攻する敵機動部隊を迎撃、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title: Bq1?: Battle of Okinoshima Island
quests.description: Sortie a fleet to world 2-4 and score two S rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
軽巡級旗艦と駆逐艦4隻の水雷戦隊を基幹とした艦隊を編成、
南西諸島防衛線に反復出撃し、同海域の制海権確保に努めよ！
quests.title_ja: 水雷戦隊、南西防衛線に反復出撃せよ！
quests.title: B75: Torpedo Squadron and Nansei Islands Defence
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a light cruiser flagship, 4 destroyers, and another ship of your choice to World 1-4 and score two S rank victories at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
軽空母旗艦と駆逐艦3隻を基幹とした護衛艦隊を編成、
製油所地帯沿岸に展開し、同海域の哨戒を実施、同海域の安全を確保せよ！
quests.title_ja: 製油所地帯沿岸の哨戒を実施せよ！
quests.title: B76: Oil Refinery Patrol
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a light carrier flagship, 3 destroyers, and up to two additional ships to World 1-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
水雷戦隊を基幹とした有力な艦隊で南西諸島海域バシー島沖及び東部オリョール海を哨戒、
同海域に遊弋する敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 水雷戦隊、南西諸島海域を哨戒せよ！
quests.title: B77: Torpedo Squadron's Patrol of the North Seas
quests.description: Sortie a fleet of 1 light cruiser flagship, 4 destroyers, and an additional ship to Worlds 2-2 and 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss nodes.

quests.description_ja:
特型駆逐艦4隻による「第十九駆逐隊」を鎮守府近海に展開！
鎮守府正面対潜哨戒を実施し、跳梁する敵潜部隊の制圧に努めよ！
quests.title: B78: Sortie the 19th Destroyer Division
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Isonami (磯波), Uranami (浦波), Ayanami (綾波), and Shikinami (敷波) to World 1-5 and score an A rank (or higher) victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
「第十九駆逐隊」を含む有力な艦隊を編成し、南西諸島海域沖ノ島沖に展開！
同方面に遊弋する敵主力を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第十九駆逐隊」敵主力に突入せよ！
quests.title: B79: 19th Destroyer Division Against the Enemy Flagship
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Isonami (磯波), Uranami (浦波), Ayanami (綾波), Shikinami (敷波) and two additional ships to World 2-5 and score an A rank (or higher) victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
中部海域における航空偵察「K作戦」を再度実施、さらに同方面に遊弋する敵艦隊を撃滅し、
中部海域における飛行場設営の準備を実施せよ！
quests.title_ja: 飛行場設営の準備を実施せよ！
quests.title: B80: Central Waters Air Base Construction
quests.description: Sortie to World 6-3 and score an S rank at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 南方サブ島沖海域へ精鋭艦隊を突入！敵艦隊の邀撃を突破し、同方面の敵上陸部隊を叩け！
quests.title_ja: 夜間突入！敵上陸部隊を叩け！
quests.title: B81: Night Battle Against the Enemy Landing Forces
quests.description: Sortie to World 5-3 and score and A rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
有力な艦隊をカムラン半島に投入、同方面に出没する敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
そして、夜を照らす「灯り」を入手せよ！　ある季節は夜戦以外にも使い道があるようだ！
quests.title_ja: 夜の海を照らす「灯り」を入手せよ！
quests.title: B82: Searching for a Searchlight
quests.description: Sortie to World 2-1 and score an S rank at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
秋刀魚漁の漁場に展開、遊弋する敵艦隊を撃破して、「秋刀魚」を三尾入手せよ、ですって！
近海、北方海域、中部海域のどこかに秋刀魚漁に適した漁場があるみたい！
quests.title_ja: 秋刀魚漁：きらりーん！秋刀魚漁支援！
quests.title: Pacific saury fishing: It's time to shine! Mackerel fishing support!
quests.description: Have 3 saury in your inventory.

quests.description_ja:
ちょおっと大変だけど、漁場の安全を確保して「秋刀魚」を八尾確保するんだって！
あまり乱獲したり、暫く同じ海域で続けてると獲れにくくなるみたい。海域を変えてみましょ！
quests.title_ja: 秋刀魚漁：もっともーっと、秋刀魚漁！
quests.title: Pacific saury fishing: Fish for more and more mackerel!
quests.description: Have 8 saury in your inventory.

quests.description_ja:
かなーり大変だけれど、ほら、私たち最新鋭の秋刀魚漁支援艦隊じゃない？
最新鋭、最新鋭、最新鋭の秋刀魚漁、張り切っていきましょー！よろしくお願いしまぁーす！
quests.title_ja: 秋刀魚漁：最新鋭の秋刀魚漁！もっとぉ！
quests.title: Pacific saury fishing: Ultra-modern saury fishing! We need moooooore!
quests.description: Have 24 saury in your inventory.

quests.description_ja:
水上機母艦または航空巡洋艦を旗艦とする有力な艦隊を南西諸島防衛線に投入、
水上機戦力によって同防衛線を強化、同方面の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 南西諸島防衛線を増強せよ！
quests.title: B83: Reinforce the Nansei Island Defence Line
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a seaplane tender or an aviation cruiser as the flagship and up to 5 additional ships to world 1-4 and score an S rank at the boss node.

quests.description_ja: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」を沖ノ島海域前面に展開、敵主力艦隊を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
quests.title_ja: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」出撃せよ！
quests.title: B84: Deploy the 3rd Generation of the 16th Squadron
quests.description: Sortie Kinu (鬼怒), Aoba (青葉), Kitakami (北上), Ooi (大井), and up to two additional ships to World 2-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
再編成を完了した精鋭「第十六戦隊」を南西諸島海域沖ノ島沖に展開、
同方面に遊弋する敵主力を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
quests.title_ja: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」突入せよ！
quests.title: B85: Deploy the Elite 16th Squadron
quests.description: Sortie Kinu Kai2 (鬼怒改二) as the flagship and any 5 out the following ships: Kitakami Kai2 (北上改二), Ooi Kai2 (大井改二), Kuma Kai (球磨改), Aoba Kai (青葉改), Uranami Kai (浦波改), Shikinami Kai (敷波改) to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
「鬼怒改二」を旗艦、僚艦に「浦波改」他駆逐艦3隻の計5隻の艦隊で
バシー島沖における柳輸送作戦を実施、同輸送作戦を完全成功させ、帰還せよ！
quests.title_ja: 輸送作戦を成功させ、帰還せよ！
quests.title: B86: Complete a Transport Mission
quests.description: Sortie Kinu Kai2 (鬼怒改二) as the flagship, Uranami Kai (浦波改), exactly 3 other destroyers, and an additional non-destroyer ship to World 2-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
重巡4隻を基幹戦力とした重巡旗艦の艦隊を南西諸島海域東部オリョール海に展開し、
同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅、制海権を確保せよ！
quests.title: B87: Heavy Cruiser Squadron, Weigh Anchor!
quests.description: Take a fleet consisting of 4 CA/CAV with a CA/CAV as the flagship and two other ships of choice to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
戦艦2隻を中核戦力とする戦艦旗艦の艦隊を北方海域アルフォンシーノ方面に進出させ、
同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅、北方海域の制海権確保に努めよ！
quests.title: B88: Battleship Squadron, Sortie!
quests.description: Take a fleet consisting of 2 BB/FBB/BBV with a BB/FBB/BBV as the flagship, two CV/CVL and two other ships of choice to World 3-3 to the boss node and gain a victory there. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.description_ja:
駆逐艦4隻による精鋭「駆逐隊」を編成し、鎮守府正面海域及び南西諸島沖に出撃、
両海域の敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 冬季特別任務：精鋭「駆逐隊」、出撃！
quests.title: SB15: Winter Special Mission: Elite Destroyers, Sortie!
quests.description: Take a fleet of only 4 DDs and score an S rank victory at the boss node of World 1-1 and World 1-2. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.description_ja:
水上機母艦を旗艦とし、護衛駆逐艦3隻を含む艦隊を編成、
製油所地帯沿岸及び南西諸島防衛線に展開、同海域に出没する敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 冬季特別任務：水上機母艦、抜錨せよ！
quests.title: SB16: Winter Special Mission: Seaplane Tender, Set Sail!
quests.description: Take a fleet with 1 AV as the flagship + 3 DD and 2 other ships of choice to World 1-3 and World 1-4 and score S-rank victories at boss nodes.
