quests.description_ja:
戦艦または航空戦艦2隻以上からなる強力な戦艦戦隊を中核とした艦隊を沖ノ島海域前面に展開、
侵攻する敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 主力戦艦戦隊、抜錨せよ！
quests.title: B89: Battleship Squadron, Weigh Anchor!
quests.description: Take 2 BB/BBV + 4 other ships of choice to World 2-4 and score an S-rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
節分実施の準備として第1艦隊に4隻(内駆逐艦2隻含む)からなる精鋭艦隊を配備、鎮守府正面海域、
南西諸島沖、及び東部オリョール海へ展開、同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅し、節分の制海権を確保せよ！
quests.title_ja: 節分特別出撃：制海権を確保せよ！
quests.title: SB21: Special Setsubun Quest: Obtain Naval Supremacy!
quests.description: Use a fleet of only 4 ships (must include 2 DD) and sortie to World 1-1, World 1-2, and World 2-3. Score S rank victories at boss nodes.

quests.description_ja:
「荒潮改二」を旗艦とし、僚艦に「第八駆逐隊」から1隻を配備した精鋭第1艦隊で
サーモン海域北方に突入、同方面に接近する有力な敵艦隊を捕捉、同方面の敵戦力の漸減に努めよ！
quests.title_ja: 精鋭「第八駆逐隊」突入せよ！
quests.title: B90: Elite 8th Destroyer Division, Sortie!
quests.description: With Arashio Kai Ni (荒潮改二) as the flagship and one of the three following ships: Asashio (朝潮), Ooshio (大潮) or Michishio (満潮), sortie to 5-5 and score an A rank victory at the boss node twice.

quests.description_ja:
潜水艦を旗艦とし、4隻以上の有力な潜水艦を配備した第一艦隊、精鋭潜水艦隊で
中部海域哨戒線に進出、回航中の敵空母を捕捉、これを襲撃せよ！
quests.title_ja: 潜水艦隊、中部海域の哨戒を実施せよ！
quests.title: B91: Submarine Fleet's Central Waters Patrol
quests.description: Send a Fleet consisting of 4 SS(V) with an SS(V) as the flagship with two additional ships to World 6-1 and score a B rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
春の準備任務：艦隊を東部オリョール海に反復出撃、同方面敵艦隊を覆滅し、
同海域周辺の制海権を完全に確保、桃の節句を迎える準備を完遂せよ！
quests.title_ja: 春の準備任務：桃の節句準備を完遂せよ！
quests.title: SB22: Spring Preparation Mission: Carry Out the Hinamatsuri Preparations
quests.description: Score 5 S rank victories at the boss node of World 2-3.

quests.description_ja: 第一艦隊旗艦に「Zara due」を配備、同艦隊で南方サブ島沖海域へ突入！同方面の敵艦隊群を突破し、鉄底海峡に展開する敵戦力を撃破せよ！
quests.title_ja: 重装甲巡洋艦、鉄底海峡に突入せよ！
quests.title: B92: Heavy Armored Curiser, Embark into the Ironbottom Sound!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Zara Due as the flagship to World 5-3 and score an A rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
軽巡を旗艦とした艦隊を編成し、南西諸島防衛線、バシー島沖及び
東部オリョール海に展開、同海域に遊弋する敵艦隊を撃破せよ！
quests.title_ja: 南西諸島方面の敵艦隊を撃破せよ！
quests.title: B93: Defeat the Enemy Fleet at the Nansei Islands
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a CL as the flagship and 5 additional ships to Worlds 1-4, 2-2, 2-3 and obtain S rank victories at the boss nodes.

quests.description_ja:
航空母艦、または水上機母艦を旗艦とした有力な艦隊を編成、北方AL海域、
西方海域カスガダマ沖 、中部海域MS諸島沖に展開し、各海域の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 洋上航空戦力を拡充せよ！
quests.title: B94: Expand the Offshore Aviation Forces
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with an AV/CV/CVL/CVB as the flagship and 5 additional ships tos World 3-5, 4-4, 6-2 and obtain S-rank victories at the boss nodes.

quests.description_ja:
改装航空巡洋艦「鈴谷改二」を旗艦とした精強な艦隊を編成、同艦隊を南方海域に展開、
南方海域前面、及びサブ島沖海域に遊弋する敵艦隊群を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
quests.title: B95: Remodelled Aviation Cruiser, Sortie
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Suzuya Kai2 (鈴谷改二) as the flagship and score an A rank victory at the boss nodes of Worlds 5-1 and 5-3.

quests.description_ja:
改装航空母艦「鈴谷航改二」を旗艦とした精強な機動部隊を編成、同艦隊を中部海域に進出。
MS諸島沖、KW環礁沖海域に展開し、同海域の敵機動部隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 改装攻撃型軽空母、前線展開せよ！
quests.title: B96: Remodelled Light Aircraft Carrier, Deploy to the Frontlines
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Suzuya Carrier Kai2 (鈴谷航改二) as the flagship to Worlds 6-2, 6-5 and obtain S-rank victories at the boss nodes.

quests.description_ja:
巡洋艦クラスを旗艦に配備、2隻以上の駆逐艦を擁する警戒艦隊を編成せよ。同警戒艦隊を以て、
鎮守府海域(南西諸島/製油所地帯沿岸/南西諸島防衛線/鎮守府近海)の警戒任務にあたれ！
quests.title_ja: 鎮守府海域警戒を厳とせよ！
quests.title: B97: Patrol the Naval Base Ocean Areas Vigilantly
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with a cruiser as the flagship and at least 2 destroyers to Worlds 1-2, 1-3, 1-4, 1-5 and obtain S-rank victories at the boss nodes.

quests.description_ja:
戦果拡張作戦：我が第一艦隊に精鋭艦艇を集中配備、同精鋭艦隊を以て、南西諸島の沖ノ島海域、
中部海域哨戒線、グアノ環礁沖の敵艦隊を撃破、中部北海域ピーコック島の敵戦力を破砕殲滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 戦果拡張任務！「Z作戦」前段作戦
quests.title: Bq2: Ranking Points Boost Mission! "Operation Z", First Part
quests.description: Sortie a fleet to Worlds 2-4, 6-1, 6-3 and score A rank victories at the boss nodes; sortie to World 6-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

quests.description_ja:
海上護衛作戦：駆逐艦または海防艦3隻以上を含む護衛艦隊を編成し、鎮守府海域の製油所地帯沿岸、
南西諸島防衛線、鎮守府近海、鎮守府近海航路にそれぞれ展開、各海域における作戦を成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 海上護衛体制の強化に努めよ！
quests.title: B98: Focus the Strengthening of the Maritime Escort !
quests.description: Sortie a fleet consisting of 3 DD/DE to world 1-3, 1-4, 1-5 and S rank the boss nodes. Sortie to world 1-6 and clear.

quests.description_ja:
新編「第一戦隊」出撃任務：戦艦「長門改二」を旗艦、二番艦に「陸奥改」を配備した第一艦隊で出撃！
カレー洋リランカ島沖、サーモン海域北方に展開し、同海域の敵艦隊主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第一戦隊」、抜錨せよ！
quests.title: B99: Sortie the New First Squadron!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Nagato Kai Ni (長門改二) as the flagship and Mutsu Kai (陸奥改) and up to 4 additional ships to world 4-5 and 5-5 and S rank the boss nodes.

quests.description_ja:
出撃任務：軽巡1隻以上、駆逐艦または海防艦2隻以上、さらに航空巡洋艦または軽空母で増強した
第一護衛艦隊を第一艦隊に編成、南西諸島海域の各海域に展開、敵艦隊を撃破、各作戦を成功させよ！
quests.title_ja: 増強海上護衛総隊、抜錨せよ！
quests.title: B100: All Surface Escort Fleets, Sortie!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet consiting of 1 CL, 2 DD/DE, 1 CAV,CVL, and two additional ships to worlds 2-2, 2-3, 2-4, and 2-5 and S rank the boss node. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.description_ja:
出撃任務：新編「第七戦隊」を出撃！　カレー洋リランカ島沖「深海東洋艦隊漸減作戦」、
MS諸島沖「MS諸島防衛戦」において、敵艦隊主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
quests.title_ja: 新編「第七戦隊」、出撃せよ！
quests.title: B101: New Seventh Squadron, Sortie!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Kumano Kai Ni (熊野改二) as the flagship, Suzuya Kai Ni (鈴谷改二) as the second ship, both Mogami Kai (最上改) and Mikuma Kai (三隈改) and two other ships to worlds 4-5 and 6-2 and S rank the boss node. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: B102: Elite Fourth Carrier Division, set sail!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Ise (伊勢) as the flagship, Hyuuga (日向) as the second ship, 1 Light Cruiser, 2 Destroyers and 1 additional ship to worlds 2-5 and 3-5 and A rank the boss node. Both Ise and Hyuuga must be over level 50 (Kai forms are also acceptable). Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: B103: Flagship Yura, set sail!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Yura Kai2 (由良改二) as the flagship and at least 2 of the following ships: Murasame (村雨), Yuudachi(夕立), Harusame(春雨), Samidare(五月雨) or Akizuki(秋月) and 3 additional ships to worlds 2-3 and 5-1 and A rank the boss node. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: Bq3: Transport Fleet Forces, Launch!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with 2 BBV/AO and up to 4 additional ships to world 1-6 and reach the final node twice.

quests.title: Bq4: Perform aerial reconnaissance on the frontlines!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with an AV, 2 CL and 3 additional ships to world 6-3 and A rank the boss node twice.

quests.title: B104: Sortie the Elite 22th Destroyer Squadron!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Fumizuki Kai2 (文月改二), Satsuki Kai2 (皐月改二), Minazuki Kai (水無月改) and Nagatsuki (長月改) to world 3-2 and S-rank the boss node. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: B105: Reinforced Large Aircraft Carrier, Set Sail!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Saratoga Mk.II or Mod.2 as flagship, 1 CL, 2 DDs and 2 other ships to world 5-5 and 6-2 and S-rank the boss node. Two selectable rewards; clicking on any option will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: B106: Night Operations Carrier, Sortie to the Frontlines!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Saratoga Mk.II (not Mod.2) with 5 other ships to world 6-5 and S-rank the boss node. Two selectable rewards; clicking on any option will lock the choice in as your selection.

quests.title: B107: Secure the Safety of the Transportation Route!
quests.description: Sortie a CL, 2 DD/DEs and up to 3 additional ships to worlds 1-3, 1-4, and 1-5 and S-rank the boss node.

quests.title: B108: 8th Destroyer Division, to the South West
quests.description: Sortie a fleet with Asashio, Arashio, Ooshio, Michishio and 2 other ships to worlds 1-2 and 2-2 and S-rank the boss node.

quests.title: B109: Most Elite 8th Destroyer Division, All-out Sortie!
quests.description: Sortie a fleet containing Asashio Kai2, Arashio Kai2, Ooshio Kai2, Michishio Kai2 and 2 other ships to worlds 3-2 and 5-4 and S-rank the boss node. Selectable reward; clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection.
